translation.en: [man 1] Gunther, Bola,
translation.zh: 冈瑟 博拉

translation.en: thank you for joining us here in our bubble.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们加入我们的泡泡剧组

translation.en: As the producer on this movie, here's what I expect from you.
translation.zh: 作为这部电影的制片人以下是我对你们的期望

translation.en: -Actors are animals. -[woman scoffs]
translation.zh: 演员是动物

translation.en: You are animal handlers.
translation.zh: 你们是管理动物的人员

translation.en: Sometimes, they wanna play with you. Sometimes, they'll rip your balls off.
translation.zh: 有时 他们想跟你们玩 有时 他们会把你们的蛋蛋扯下来

translation.en: Don't listen to anything they say. They're liars.
translation.zh: 别信他们的任何话 他们都是骗子

translation.en: They literally lie for a living. That's their literal job, yeah?
translation.zh: 他们就是以说谎谋生的这是他们的真实工作 好吗？

translation.en: Don't party with them.
translation.zh: 别跟他们寻欢作乐

translation.en: Don't tire them out.
translation.zh: 别把他们累坏了

translation.en: Don't fuck them.
translation.zh: 别跟他们上床

translation.en: I won't.
translation.zh: 我不会的

translation.en: Always tell them they're fantastic in the movie.
translation.zh: 要不停地告诉他们他们在电影里演得很棒

translation.en: They're very insecure people. They need constant praise.
translation.zh: 他们都是极其没有安全感的人需要持续的表扬

translation.en: Make them feel good. Don't tire them out. Don't fuck them. Don't fuck them.
translation.zh: 要让他们感觉良好 别把他们累坏了别跟他们上床

translation.en: -[man 1] That's it. -That's it.
translation.zh: -就这样-就这样

translation.en: Any questions?
translation.zh: 有问题吗？

translation.en: Um… Yeah, like, what if we become proper friends?
translation.zh: 要是我们成了好朋友呢？

translation.en: -You won't. -[man 2] No?
translation.zh: -不可能-不会吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不会

translation.en: What if they confide in you
translation.zh: 如果他们对我吐露真心

translation.en: and tell you something they've not told anybody else?
translation.zh: 跟我说了没对别人讲过的秘密呢？

translation.en: Call me, tell me what they said.
translation.zh: 给我打电话 告诉我他们说了什么

translation.en: -What if they say, "Don't tell Gavin"? -[Gavin] No!
translation.zh: -假如他们说“不能告诉加文”呢？-不会的！

translation.en: -No. -This is the bubble.
translation.zh: -不会的-这里是泡泡剧组

translation.en: The sanctuary!
translation.zh: 庇护所！

translation.en: It's the only place they're safe! That's why you're not wearing masks.
translation.zh: 这是他们唯一安全的地方！所以你们才没戴口罩

translation.en: Don't you get it?
translation.zh: 你不明白吗？

translation.en: -[woman] Hi! -Hey! [laughs]
-[woman laughing] How are you? -So good to see you!
translation.zh: -你好吗？-很高兴见到你！

translation.en: -Well, imagine… -[woman] Okay, yes.
translation.zh: -想象一下…-好的 可以

translation.en: -Fake hug. -[man] Oh, wow. You look fantastic!
translation.zh: -假想拥抱-哇 你气色真好！

translation.en: [woman] Thanks. Been exercising a lot. It's the only thing keeping me sane.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我一直在锻炼这是我保持理智的唯一方法

translation.en: Well, you look sane and gorgeous, and, uh…
translation.zh: 你看起来既理智又美丽 还有…

translation.en: -What do you think about Cliff Beasts 6? -I can't leave my boyfriend right now.
translation.zh: -你想不想拍《悬崖野兽6》？-我现在不能离开男友

translation.en: He is very neurotic, and this whole time is just very triggering for him.
translation.zh: 他非常神经质他这段时间就像惊弓之鸟一样

translation.en: Huh. Okay. What if you brought him?
translation.zh: 好吧 那你带他进组如何？

translation.en: -He won't travel. -Because of the pandemic?
translation.zh: -不行 他不肯旅行-是因为疫情吗？

translation.en: No, he just won't fly. He also refuses to get a job.
translation.zh: 不是 他坐不了飞机 他也不想找工作

translation.en: I have a lot of clients working in bubbles right now, and they're having a blast.
translation.zh: 我现在有很多演员客户在泡泡剧组工作 他们很是开心

translation.en: It won't be comfortable working with them.
translation.zh: 和那些家伙共事不会轻松

translation.en: They hate me for not doing Cliff Beasts 5. I can't bubble with them for three months.
translation.zh: 他们都恨我没拍《悬崖野兽5》我没法和他们一起在泡泡待三个月

translation.en: I'm gonna level with you.
translation.zh: 我就跟你说实话了 好吗？

translation.en: You need a rebound after your last film, Jerusalem Rising.
translation.zh: 演完上部电影《耶路撒冷崛起》后你需要强势复出

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -You saw the reviews.
translation.zh: 你也看到那些影评了

translation.en: -I never read my reviews. -Hang on a sec.
translation.zh: -我从来不读自己的影评-稍等

translation.en: -Can you not read those? -Just listen, okay?
translation.zh: -可以别这样吗？-你听着就好 好吗？

translation.en: "Jerusalem Rising manages to offend both Palestinians and Jews."
translation.zh: “《耶路撒冷崛起》成功地同时冒犯到了巴勒斯坦人和犹太人”

translation.en: That's one review. And it was the script. It wasn't my fault.
translation.zh: 只是一条评论而已！是剧本的错 又不是我的错！

translation.en: When Cats bombed, they didn't blame Andrew Lloyd Webber.
translation.zh: 《猫》遭到炮轰时他们没有责怪安德鲁洛伊德韦伯

translation.en: They just said, "Judi Dench fucked Cats."
translation.zh: 他们只会说“朱迪丹奇把《猫》给毁了”

translation.en: Okay, but you were the one who told me
translation.zh: 好吧 但当初是你告诉我

translation.en: I could play half-Israeli and half-Palestinian when I'm neither.
translation.zh: 我可以演以色列和巴勒斯坦混血 哪怕这两种血统我都没有

translation.en: [in ambiguous accent] I know you've been fighting for thousands of years,
translation.zh: 我知道你们几千年来一直都是死敌

translation.en: but tonight, we must join forces to fight the aliens.
translation.zh: 但是今晚 我们必须联合起来共同对抗外星人

translation.en: [in normal accent] Is my career dead?
translation.zh: 我的演艺生涯完了吗？

translation.en: Not if you make this movie.
translation.zh: 参演这部电影就不会

translation.en: And it's safe?
translation.zh: 那里安全吗？

translation.en: The safest place in the world right now is a film set.
translation.zh: 现在全世界最安全的地方就是电影片场

translation.en: The script is actually good?
translation.zh: 剧本真的很好吗？

translation.en: It made me cry.
translation.zh: 我都为之落泪了

translation.en: Oh, you're making the face like you're gonna say yes.
translation.zh: 你的表情像是要说同意

translation.en: Oh, my God, Josh is gonna have a full nervous breakdown.
translation.zh: 天啊 乔希一定会彻底精神崩溃

translation.en: I can do this, right?
translation.zh: 那我参演 好吗？

translation.en: I'll keep my head down, not get pulled into the drama,
translation.zh: 我会低调行事 不掺和狗血

translation.en: and just do my job and get out.
translation.zh: 拍完就拍屁股走人

translation.en: All right. Okay, let's do it. Yeah, put me in the bubble.
translation.zh: 好的 我加入 安排我进泡泡剧组吧

translation.en: -[Carol] Hi! -[man 2] Carol. What's up, movie star?
translation.zh: -嗨！-嘿 卡罗尔 你好啊 大影星

translation.en: This is so crazy. You sure you're gonna be okay?
translation.zh: 这也太疯狂了 你确定会没事吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, I guess I'm just worried about catching the virus, but…
translation.zh: 没事 我只是很担心会感染病毒但是…

translation.en: Well, just call me regularly.
translation.zh: 你要经常给我打电话

translation.en: Actually, I just heard that veterinarians are gonna start treating people,
translation.zh: 其实 我最近听说兽医要开始治疗人类了

translation.en: so that'll help.
translation.zh: 所以 这应该能帮到忙

translation.en: Yeah, and it's only three months. Three months! We can do this!
translation.zh: 对 只是三个月而已 我们可以的！

translation.en: Oh, wait! Somebody wants to say hi!
translation.zh: 等等！有人想给你打招呼！

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Look who it is!
translation.zh: 看看是谁！

translation.en: I miss you so much, Mommy.
translation.zh: 我好想你 妈妈

translation.en: Aw. I'm not your mommy yet, Leila,
translation.zh: 我还不是你妈妈 莱拉

translation.en: but I will be your stepmom one day. It'll be the best!
translation.zh: 但总有一天我会成为你继母那就太好了！

translation.en: -Daddy said you left us for dead. -Oh, what?
translation.zh: -爸爸说你丢下我们不管-什么？

translation.en: -[laughs] Don't forget about us! Bye! -Bye!
translation.zh: -不要忘记我们！再见！-再见！

translation.en: -[Carol] Hey! Nice to meet you! -Hiya! I'm Pippa, production coordinator.
translation.zh: -嘿！很高兴见到你！-你好！我是皮帕 制片协调员

translation.en: Oh. Shall we? [chuckles] Welcome to Clifton House.
translation.zh: 来碰个肘 欢迎来到克利夫顿酒店

translation.en: -[Carol] This is amazing. -[Pippa] I know, right?
translation.zh: -哇 好漂亮！-对吧？

translation.en: -Carol, we're so excited you're here! -[Carol] I'm so excited to get started!
translation.zh: 卡罗尔 我们很高兴你能过来！ 我很高兴能开始拍摄了！

translation.en: -[Gavin] Wow! You look great. -[Carol] Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: 哇 你气色好极了 -谢谢-你要先做个新冠核酸检测

translation.en: -Now, you just have to do a COVID test. -[Carol] Okay.
translation.zh: -谢谢-你要先做个新冠核酸检测 好的

translation.en: -[Gunther] I'm such a big fan. -[Carol] Thank you. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我很喜欢你 谢谢

translation.en: [Gunther] And in your nose. Okay.
translation.zh: 要捅一下鼻子 好的

translation.en: -[Carol] Mm. -[Gunther] Ready? One hundred.
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？100

translation.en: Ninety-nine.
-Ninety-eight. -Uh…
-I'm only joking. -Oh!
translation.zh: 我开玩笑的

translation.en: -[chuckling] Oh, my God! You're the worst! -[Gunther] See you in a bit. Bye, friend.
translation.zh: -天啊！你真坏！-再见 朋友

translation.en: [Carol] Bye. Whoo! Yeah.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: Um, so how does the quarantining work?
translation.zh: 隔离是怎样的？

translation.en: It's a quick 14 days. We pamper you.
translation.zh: 就是短短的14天 我们会精心照顾你

translation.en: Wait till you see what we've done to your room.
translation.zh: 等着看我们把你的房间布置成了什么样吧

translation.en: -[Pippa] You have the best room by far. -[Carol] I love that.
translation.zh: -目前你的房间是最好的-我好开心

translation.en: -Ah! Bola! -[Bola] Hello.
translation.zh: -你好-博拉！

translation.en: This is Bola, our wellness specialist. Bola, how would you describe yourself?
translation.zh: 这位是博拉 我们的健康专家博拉 你都有什么职责？

translation.en: Uh, well, due to safety, we don't have a lot of staff, so I get to do everything.
translation.zh: 安全起见 我们的员工不多所以所有事都由我来做

translation.en: Which means if you need a personal trainer, Bola.
translation.zh: 也就是说 如果你需要私人教练的话就找博拉

translation.en: If you need a yoga teacher, Bola.
translation.zh: 如果你需要瑜伽老师 就找博拉

translation.en: If you need a ping-pong opponent, Bola. If you need a masseuse?
translation.zh: 如果你需要找人打乒乓球 就找博拉如果你需要按摩师？

translation.en: -[Carol] Bola! -[Bola] That's it, baby girl.
translation.zh: -就找博拉！-没错 小姑娘

translation.en: [man] We allowed to smoke weed in the room? I forgot to bring my edibles.
translation.zh: 房间里能抽大麻吗？我忘带可食用的了

translation.en: [Carol] Oh, my God! Howie, how are you?
translation.zh: 天啊 豪伊 你好吗？

translation.en: -[Howie] Carol, come here, my love! -[man 1] Stop! That's it. Stop it!
translation.zh: -卡罗尔 快过来 我的宝贝！-停下！好了 停下！

translation.en: -[man 2] Off you go. -[Howie] What the fuck is going on?
translation.zh: -快走-搞什么？

translation.en: -Brother, help me! -[Carol] Howie?
translation.zh: -兄弟 帮帮我！-豪伊？

translation.en: Give it two weeks, and you'll have all the hugs you need.
translation.zh: 两周以后 你想抱谁都可以

translation.en: [Bola] Reception area.
translation.zh: 这里是接待区

translation.en: [Carol sighs] Now, this is beautiful.
translation.zh: 好美啊

translation.en: [Bola] Of course! Top of the line for top-of-the-line talent.
translation.zh: 当然了！顶尖人才就该得到顶尖的待遇

translation.en: [Bola] There you are.
translation.zh: 到了

translation.en: [Carol gasps] This is nice!
translation.zh: 太棒了！

translation.en: [Bola] Good. See you in two weeks.
translation.zh: 很好 两周后见

translation.en: She loves you! And you're the prime minister!
translation.zh: 她爱你！你是首相！

translation.en: Am I your bitch now?
translation.zh: 现在够劲了吗？

translation.en: That's what you get for fucking with her mission!
translation.zh: 这就是你破坏她任务的下场！

translation.en: [groans] This is too much for anyone to take!
translation.zh: 这种痛苦任何人都承受不了！

translation.en: Hey, Carol Cobb.
translation.zh: 嘿 卡罗尔柯布

translation.en: Your quarantine is over. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你的隔离结束了

translation.en: Uh, the cocktail party starts in one hour, okay?
translation.zh: 鸡尾酒派对一个小时后开始 好吗？

translation.en: Please shower before you come.
translation.zh: 参加前务必洗浴

translation.en: It stinks in here.
translation.zh: 这里好臭

translation.en: -Jesus Christ. -[door closes]
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -This is so exciting. -[man] Hmm.
translation.zh: 我好激动

translation.en: It's like my movie posters have come to life.
translation.zh: 感觉我的电影海报都活了

translation.en: Yeah, you will soon learn to hate these people.
translation.zh: 好吧 你很快就会讨厌这些人

translation.en: You abandoned us.
translation.zh: 你抛弃了我们

translation.en: I am mad at you. Back away.
translation.zh: 我非常生你的气 退后

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 很抱歉 我很抱歉

translation.en: -Are you? -[Carol] I am.
translation.zh: -是吗？-是的

translation.en: I should have done the movie. I shouldn't have bailed.
translation.zh: 我应该拍那部电影的 我不该退出

translation.en: I'm an idiot.
translation.zh: 我就是个傻子

translation.en: I missed you so much. I did.
translation.zh: 我很想你们 真的

translation.en: -You did? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 是吗？ 对啊

translation.en: Sorry. Had to get that off my chest.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我必须发泄出那口气

translation.en: Yeah, give it to me. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 对啊 尽情对我发泄吧

translation.en: And I really liked you in Jerusalem Rising.
translation.zh: 我真的很喜欢你在《耶路撒冷崛起》中的表现

translation.en: -[woman] Yeah. -Really?
translation.zh: -是的-真的吗？

translation.en: That means so much coming from you.
translation.zh: -没错-你的肯定对我来说意义重大

translation.en: And I think that all of the critics around the world are wrong.
translation.zh: 我认为世界各地的影评家都瞎了眼

translation.en: Oh, not everyone.
translation.zh: 也不是所有的

translation.en: Four percent on Rotten Tomatoes. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 烂番茄指数4%

translation.en: It doesn't really go lower.
translation.zh: 不能更低了

translation.en: So I need cool, documentary-style footage.
translation.zh: 我需要冷静的纪录片风格影像

translation.en: If the actors ask for air, give them air, but then strike and get what we need.
translation.zh: 如果演员需要空间 给他们就是然后突然出击 拍到我们想要的镜头

translation.en: I want you to be a fly on the wall,
translation.zh: 我希望拍摄时采用纪实风格

translation.en: but also up their arse.
translation.zh: 但也要把他们拍得很美

translation.en: -Now, fuck off, Lee. -My name is Scott, actually.
translation.zh: -滚吧 李-其实我叫斯科特

translation.en: -I don't care. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我不在乎-好的

translation.en: You a big Cliff Beasts fan?
translation.zh: 你非常喜欢《悬崖野兽》吗？

translation.en: No, but I saw the trailer for the second one. It was so cool!
translation.zh: 不是 但我看了第二部的预告片非常酷！

translation.en: -Oh. -[Scott] Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: Hi, y'all!
translation.zh: 嘿 大家好！

translation.en: Excited for Cliff Beasts?
translation.zh: 期待《悬崖野兽》吗？

translation.en: [whispers] Is this the movie?
translation.zh: 已经开拍了吗？

translation.en: [Scott hesitates] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Are we shooting right now?
translation.zh: 这是在拍摄吗？

translation.en: No, it's just behind-the-scenes stuff.
translation.zh: 不 我就是拍点幕后花絮

translation.en: Just say, like, a sentence about why you're excited?
translation.zh: 你能表达一下自己激动的心情吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry. You're gonna have to talk to my mom if you wanna talk to me.
translation.zh: 抱歉 如果你想跟我说话得先征得我妈妈的同意

translation.en: Oh, all right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -It's nice meeting you. -Okay, you too.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你-好 我也是

translation.en: -[woman] Dieter! Hi! -Hi.
translation.zh: -迪特尔！嗨！-嗨

translation.en: Lauren. Um…
translation.zh: 我是劳伦

translation.en: I just wanted to tell you how incredible you were in Hunger Strike.
translation.zh: 我就是想告诉你你在《绝食抗议》里的表演很惊艳

translation.en: Your performance was…
translation.zh: 你的表演…

translation.en: I mean, I think about it all the time. Just fearless and a total triumph.
translation.zh: 我每时每刻都在想你是那样毫无畏惧 堪称典范

translation.en: Um… Congratulations.
translation.zh: 恭喜了

translation.en: I don't watch my own shit. Never watch your own shit.
translation.zh: 我不看自己演的片子永远别看自己拉出来的东西

translation.en: You just wipe, you flush, and you move on.
translation.zh: 擦完屁股 冲水 走人就好

translation.en: Right. Well, anyway, I just wanted to let you know that it really stuck with me,
translation.zh: 好吧 总之 我只是想让你知道这片子在我脑海里挥之不去

translation.en: and it was very powerful. Just…
translation.zh: 它太有感染力了 真的…

translation.en: Yeah. Where's your husband?
translation.zh: 好的 你丈夫呢？

translation.en: My husband? We got divorced.
translation.zh: 我丈夫吗？我们离婚了

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [Dieter] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉了

translation.en: No worries. It's… We're fine.
translation.zh: 没关系 我们没事

translation.en: We are, uh… totally fine.
translation.zh: 我们 完全没事

translation.en: We have gone through a lot, and we are coming out on the other side.
translation.zh: 我们经历了很多 但也在慢慢走出来

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 对啊

translation.en: Our main priority is our 16-year-old son,
translation.zh: 我们一切都以16岁的儿子为重

translation.en: who we just adopted right before the divorce.
translation.zh: 我们在离婚前刚刚领养了他

translation.en: Listen, I'm sorry, I'm trying to care, but it's hard.
translation.zh: 听着 我很抱歉我很想关心你 但是太难了

translation.en: Gunther, I like you.
translation.zh: 冈瑟 我喜欢你

translation.en: Really? I like you too. I think you're… Okay, 'cause…
translation.zh: 真的吗？我也喜欢你我觉得你…好吧 因为…

translation.en: That feels amazing,
translation.zh: 这感觉真是太棒了

translation.en: 'cause we got told we weren't allowed to be friends with the cast.
translation.zh: 因为我们被告知不允许和演员交朋友

translation.en: Who said that?
translation.zh: 谁说的？

translation.en: I don't wanna be a person that's like, "It was Gavin," but, yeah.
translation.zh: 我不想当告密者 “噢 是加文”但是 没错

translation.en: Know how I feel about that?
translation.zh: 你知道我怎么想吗？你去死吧 加文！

translation.en: -Fuck you, Gavin! -Do you?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Suck your mum, Gavin! Say it from your chest.
translation.zh: 去你妈的 加文！大声说出来吧

translation.en: What? [mumbles] Fuck you, Gavin!
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I need to be real with you. I don't understand these bullshit rules.
translation.zh: 冈瑟 我要跟你说实话我不理解这些狗屁规定

translation.en: Been in my room two weeks. I ain't had human contact.
translation.zh: 我在房间里待了两周没有任何人际接触

translation.en: It's important for my mental and physical health to have human contact with friends.
translation.zh: 跟朋友进行人际接触对我的身体和精神健康都十分重要

translation.en: -We're friends! -Completely.
translation.zh: -我们是朋友！-没错

translation.en: -What will happen if I touch you? Huh? -We could die.
translation.zh: -我就算碰一下你会怎样？-我们可能会死

translation.en: Yeah, completely. It's kind of the situation.
translation.zh: 完全没错 情况就是这样

translation.en: -Yeah. -Boop!
translation.zh: -没错-哔！

translation.en: -Um-- -Did we die? Are you dead?
translation.zh: 我们死了吗？你死了吗？

translation.en: You've just got to understand that my job, as a health officer,
translation.zh: 你必须理解我的工作 作为健康官员

translation.en: is to make sure that everything that we're doing is as safe as possible.
translation.zh: 我一定要确保我们所做的一切都尽可能安全

translation.en: All the best, Gunther.
translation.zh: 祝你一切顺利 冈瑟

translation.en: -Um, my dad does stunts. -Hi.
translation.zh: -我爸爸是特技演员-嗨

translation.en: Um, I'm lonely, and I'm in hell here,
translation.zh: 我很孤单 我在这里生不如死

translation.en: and I would like to form an alliance with you.
translation.zh: 我想和你结成联盟

translation.en: [hesitates] Okay, yeah, sure.
translation.zh: 好啊 没问题

translation.en: All right, okay.
translation.zh: 那好 就这样

translation.en: It was hard doing the last one without you.
translation.zh: 上一部没有你 我拍得太辛苦了

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I'm sorry. I got really bad advice from my reps
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 我的代理人提供了糟糕的建议而且我还需要处理一些感情问题

translation.en: and was also having some, ahem, emotional issues.
translation.zh: 我的代理人提供了糟糕的建议而且我还需要处理一些感情问题

translation.en: That's where you were on your journey, and it brought you right back here.
translation.zh: 你的人生之旅进行到了那里它把你带回了这里

translation.en: -[Carol] Exactly. -It's all good.
translation.zh: -没错-没关系

translation.en: -I heard you were starting a religion. -No, it's a… [chuckles nervously]
translation.zh: 我听说你创建了宗教 不 就是…

translation.en: It's a lifestyle brand slash motivational system
translation.zh: 就是一种生活方式品牌和动机系统

translation.en: called Harmony Ignite.
translation.zh: 叫做和谐点燃

translation.en: Wow. And you wrote a whole Bible.
translation.zh: 哇！你写了一整本《圣经》

translation.en: Well, I wrote a book. A book called Harmony Ignited.
translation.zh: 其实 我是写了一本书一本叫《点燃和谐》的书

translation.en: And, uh, it's just a collection of my thoughts and musings
translation.zh: 就是一部关于我的想法、沉思

translation.en: and some sayings and wisdom and proverbs. That's it, yeah.
translation.zh: 一些语录、智慧和谚语的合集对 就是这样

translation.en: It's not a religion, per se. You can leave anytime that you want to.
translation.zh: 本质上不是宗教信仰随时想脱离都可以

translation.en: -It's not, like, a cult. -No, it's definitely not a cult.
translation.zh: -对 不是邪教-不 肯定不是邪教

translation.en: I mean, who defines what a cult is?
translation.zh: 谁来定义什么是邪教呢？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay.
translation.zh: -对啊-好吧

translation.en: You know what? I'm gonna be really straightforward with you right now
translation.zh: 知道吗？我现在就对你有话直说了

translation.en: and let you know that we are co-parents to Raphael, and that is it.
translation.zh: 让你知道我们要共同养育拉斐尔就这样

translation.en: That's true.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: So what happened on parts one and three and four is not happening again.
translation.zh: 第一部、第三部、第四部拍摄期间发生的事情 不会再发生了

translation.en: What about what we did on part two?
translation.zh: 那我们在第二部拍摄期间做的事呢？

translation.en: You have no respect for me.
translation.zh: 你对我毫无敬意

translation.en: I have nothing but respect for you.
translation.zh: 我对你满满的敬意

translation.en: Stop.
translation.zh: 够了

translation.en: Stop.
translation.zh: 够了

translation.en: -Stop it. -Stop.
translation.zh: -你够了-你够了

translation.en: I would appreciate if you didn't look at me like that.
translation.zh: 拜托你别这样看我

translation.en: -Where should I look? -I can't look at you.
translation.zh: -那我应该看哪？-我不能看你！

translation.en: -I'm still here though. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 不过我还在这里

translation.en: I know you.
translation.zh: 我知道你

translation.en: -God. Hi. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: -How are you doing? Sorry to scare you. -Don't worry. I am so excited that you are here.
translation.zh: 你好 很抱歉吓到你了你能来真是让我太开心了

translation.en: Oh, yeah. No, I'm so excited.
translation.zh: 对 我也很期待

translation.en: Gotta tell you, I love the TikTok stuff.
translation.zh: 我得告诉你 我超爱你拍的抖音

translation.en: You are crushing it. Absolutely crushing it.
translation.zh: 你真是太厉害了 完全玩转这软件了

translation.en: I mean, clearly. 120 million followers. You are unbelievable.
translation.zh: 很明显嘛一亿两千万粉丝 你太牛了！

translation.en: I love the one where you and your cat lip-synch to Harry Potter.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你和你的猫对口型模仿《哈利波特》片段的那个视频

translation.en: I can't believe you've seen all that.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信你都看了

translation.en: [laughs] It's fantastic! Hey, maybe you and I can do one together while we're here.
translation.zh: 太妙了！嘿 正好咱俩都在这里或许可以一起合拍

translation.en: -Oh, yeah, maybe. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 或许吧 好的

translation.en: -What's your name? -Carla.
translation.zh: -你叫什么？-卡拉

translation.en: Nice to meet you. You got great energy about you.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你 卡拉你身上充满了活力

translation.en: Gavs!
translation.zh: 小加！

translation.en: Who is that?
translation.zh: 他是谁？

translation.en: One of the actors. He's not that good though.
translation.zh: 剧组的一个演员 不过他咖位不大

translation.en: -[piano music playing] -May I refresh your water?
translation.zh: 要给你添水吗？

translation.en: Yeah, please.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Why you look at me with weird eyes? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你为什么用这种奇怪的眼神看我？

translation.en: -Jesus fucking Christ. -Wow.
translation.zh: 我的老天爷

translation.en: -[man] Hey! -[woman] Hey!
-[Gavin] Okay. -Hit us with it, Gav.
translation.zh: -好啊-开讲吧 小加

translation.en: Welcome! I'm gonna introduce somebody now who is…
translation.zh: 欢迎大家！我要向大家介绍一位…

translation.en: He's special.
translation.zh: 特别的人

translation.en: He's funny.
translation.zh: 他风趣幽默

translation.en: He's extremely intelligent.
translation.zh: 他有大智慧

translation.en: And he's a…
translation.zh: 他还是…

translation.en: He's a visionary.
translation.zh: 他还是个有远见的人

translation.en: He shot a brilliant movie called Tiles of Love while working at Home Depot.
translation.zh: 他在家得宝工作时拍摄了一部叫《爱情瓷砖》的优秀电影

translation.en: -Our director… Darren Eigen! -[cheering]
translation.zh: 就是我们的导演达伦艾根！

translation.en: -[whistling] Whoo! -Thank you! Thanks, you guys. Uh…
translation.zh: 谢谢你！谢谢大家

translation.en: I just wanna say
translation.zh: 我只想说

translation.en: I am so lucky to be able to work with a cast this talented.
translation.zh: 我很幸运能和一支如此才华横溢的演员团队合作

translation.en: This is your car,
translation.zh: 这是你们的车

translation.en: and I'm gonna step in and take the wheel.
translation.zh: 但我要上车 掌控方向盘了

translation.en: This drive is gonna be a little crazy.
translation.zh: 此次车程会有些许疯狂

translation.en: Gonna head towards the railing a couple of times. Might hit it.
translation.zh: 会有几次冲向护栏甚至可能会撞上去

translation.en: Some of you might not even survive.
translation.zh: 有些人可能无法生还

translation.en: But I've got the end of the road in my sight.
translation.zh: 但我已经看到了这条路的终点

translation.en: Might be a crazy ride,
translation.zh: 旅程虽然疯狂

translation.en: but it's gonna look great,
translation.zh: 但一定精彩连连

translation.en: and it's gonna make the world forget all their problems.
translation.zh: 它会让全世界的人忘记所有烦恼

translation.en: So, let's go for a ride.
translation.zh: 我们一起踏上征程吧

translation.en: We're fucked.
translation.zh: 我们完蛋了

translation.en: Are you sure it's safe?
translation.zh: 你确定这样安全吗？

translation.en: Just don't put your hands too close to your face.
translation.zh: 手不要离脸太近

translation.en: -[squawking] -[nervously] Oh, shit. Aah!
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: No! No! No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: -[Darren] Grab. Nice. Right arm. Block. -[grunting]
translation.zh: 抓住 很好 右胳膊 锁住 很好

translation.en: Move around. Good. Let me hear the rage. Aah. Spins around, kick. Great.
translation.zh: 移动 很好 让我听到愤怒转过来 踢 非常好

translation.en: [trainer] Get him, boy. Get him!
translation.zh: 咬他 狗狗 咬他！

translation.en: Heart shot! Yeah!
translation.zh: 正中靶心！耶！

translation.en: Dick shot!
translation.zh: 正中老二！

translation.en: [trainer] Over.
translation.zh: 结束

translation.en: [Howie] Oi! And roll.
translation.zh: 翻滚

translation.en: [trainer] Rusty, come! Come on, boy!
translation.zh: 拉斯蒂 过来！拉斯蒂 快啊 狗狗！

translation.en: Can you train him to peck off Dustin's balls?
translation.zh: 你能训练它啄掉达斯汀的蛋蛋吗？

translation.en: I'm just kidding.
translation.zh: 我开玩笑的

translation.en: But can you? [laughing]
translation.zh: 但可以吗？

translation.en: Gavin, how are you?
translation.zh: 加文 你好吗？

translation.en: Hi! [chuckles] How are you doing?
translation.zh: 嗨！你好吗？

translation.en: Oh, good. I just wanted to say, uh, good luck,
translation.zh: 都好 我想祝你好运

translation.en: and we love you, and we're counting on you.
translation.zh: 我们很爱你 我们就靠你了

translation.en: I know. I'm on it.
translation.zh: 我知道 我在努力

translation.en: You are such a hero for keeping the lights on at the studio.
translation.zh: 你维持着公司的运转 真是太伟大了

translation.en: This lockdown has been so hard on all of us.
translation.zh: 这次封锁让我们所有人日子都不好过

translation.en: But you're skiing?
translation.zh: 但你是在滑雪吗？

translation.en: Yeah, well, this was the only country that was open. Thank God I got my shot.
translation.zh: 对 只有这个国家还对外开放谢天谢地我打疫苗了

translation.en: [chuckles] Did you? I thought they weren't available for six months.
translation.zh: 是吗？我还以为六个月后才能打

translation.en: Oh, they're not. Not for normal people, but I'm with rich people.
translation.zh: 不是的 普通人要等六个月但我和富人是一伙的

translation.en: Don't hate the player, hate the game. Ugh! I hate the game.
translation.zh: 别怪我 要怪就怪体制我对体制恨之入骨

translation.en: Anyway, have a great shoot.
translation.zh: 总之 祝你拍摄愉快

translation.en: I love you. I'm in love with you.
translation.zh: 我爱你 我爱上你了

translation.en: And do not fuck me!
translation.zh: 别给我搞砸了！

translation.en: So the thing about Harmony Ignite is it's about dreams.
translation.zh: 和谐点燃的宗旨是关于梦想的

translation.en: It's about how you go about fulfilling your dreams.
translation.zh: 关于怎样实现自己的梦想

translation.en: I'm not really looking for a new religion.
translation.zh: 我不需要新的宗教

translation.en: I'm Hindu. Many gods, very busy.
translation.zh: 我信印度教 我的神太多了 很忙的

translation.en: -I have a question for you, man. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 我有个问题问你 伙计

translation.en: -What's your dream? -My dream?
translation.zh: -你的梦想是什么？-我的梦想？

translation.en: Your dream. I wanna hear it.
translation.zh: 你的梦想 我想听听

translation.en: This won't be the last pandemic. We all know that.
translation.zh: 这不会是最后一次疫情 我们都知道

translation.en: -Absolutely. -We still need to have sex.
translation.zh: -没错-我们仍然需要性爱

translation.en: My brother, a software engineer in India, has invented a glove.
translation.zh: 我的哥哥 一位印度的软件工程师他研发出了一款手套

translation.en: It's like a hand that you can wrap around you
translation.zh: 就像一只手 它能裹住你的鸡鸡

translation.en: or put inside you, anally.
translation.zh: 或者插进菊花里

translation.en: Then somewhere, in a different city, somebody else has the hand,
translation.zh: 在其他城市的某个地方另一个人也有一只这样的手

translation.en: and then they do things to the hand that you feel on you or inside you.
translation.zh: 他们能够操控裹住你的鸡鸡或插进你菊花里的那只手

translation.en: You're safe. It's sanitary ecstasy. You'll be wearing virtual reality goggles,
translation.zh: 但你很安全！这超级卫生你会戴上虚拟现实眼镜

translation.en: so you can have sex anywhere in the world with anyone.
translation.zh: 这样就能和世界上任何人发生性关系

translation.en: Well, thank you for coming to pick up my tray. Appreciate it.
translation.zh: 谢谢你来收我的餐具 很感谢

translation.en: Oh, no. Sure, yeah. Uh…
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: This was… If you get lonely…
translation.zh: 这是…如果你感到孤单…

translation.en: Anika.
translation.zh: 安妮卡

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: I was wondering if you could help.
translation.zh: 我想问问你能不能帮我个忙

translation.en: With what?
translation.zh: 什么忙？

translation.en: You wanna have sex with me?
translation.zh: 你想和我滚床单吗？

translation.en: Yes, I do!
translation.zh: 好啊 我想！

translation.en: -[thumps desk] -Amazing.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: Not now.
translation.zh: 但现在不行

translation.en: When?
translation.zh: 那什么时候？

translation.en: When I get to know you, because I like you.
translation.zh: 等我了解你之后 因为我喜欢你

translation.en: -Great. -Then I would like you to meet my father.
translation.zh: -很好-然后我想让你见见我父亲

translation.en: And if you get his permission, you will sign a lifelong agreement
translation.zh: 如果你得到他的允许就会签下终生约定

translation.en: because I am a pure angel,
translation.zh: 因为我是纯洁的天使

translation.en: and you won't come across someone like me again.
translation.zh: 你不会再遇到我这样的人了

translation.en: [Gunther] Okay, hi, guys!
translation.zh: 好的 嗨 各位！

translation.en: Yeah, let's talk about zones for a moment. Uh, there are three main ones, okay?
translation.zh: 我们先来说一下各个区域这里主要有三个区域 好吗？

translation.en: There's Red Zone. That's the best zone. That's the actors, okay?
translation.zh: 有红色区域 是最好的区域是给演员用的 好吗？

translation.en: Then there's Blue Zone. That's for crew.
translation.zh: 蓝色区域 是给剧组用的

translation.en: Then there's Yellow Zone for office staff. We don't need to worry about that.
translation.zh: 还有给内勤的黄色区域那个不用我们管

translation.en: Um, a lot of you have been asking about flirting.
translation.zh: 你们很多人都在问关于调情的事情

translation.en: Yes, it happens. Um, physical touch is, of course, off the table.
translation.zh: 对 这种事在所难免当然 身体接触绝对不行

translation.en: Um, so what I would recommend is making sweet eyes at each other.
translation.zh: 所以我推荐你们彼此眉目传情

translation.en: Um, if you're wondering what that looks like, that'd be…
translation.zh: 如果你们想知道是怎样的 就是这样

translation.en: Are there any questions?
translation.zh: 有什么问题吗？

translation.en: Amazing! Let's have some fun.
translation.zh: 很好！我们来找点乐子吧

translation.en: [man 1] So, uh, Gio, this is your first expedition up Mount Everest?
translation.zh: 吉奥 这是你第一次攀登珠穆朗玛峰吗？

translation.en: [in ambiguous accent] Yes, but, uh, it is not news to me
translation.zh: 对 但我早有耳闻

translation.en: that Modelcorp is lucky to have hired all of you
translation.zh: 莫德集团有幸雇佣了你们大家

translation.en: to make sure all the creatures of this land are respected
translation.zh: 确保这片土地上的所有生物都得到尊重

translation.en: and honored.
translation.zh: 和景仰

translation.en: [man 2] It's not a creature.
translation.zh: 这次不是什么生物

translation.en: What we hear from the locals, we may be dealing with a cliff beast.
translation.zh: 根据当地人的说法我们可能要面对悬崖野兽

translation.en: Climate change has melted the whole top of the mountain.
translation.zh: 气候变化融化了整个山顶

translation.en: It's a burnt wasteland.
translation.zh: 这里成了被烧毁的荒地

translation.en: The beast must have come out of the melted permafrost.
translation.zh: 野兽一定是从融化的永久冻土里出来的

translation.en: Global warming, my ass! Who did this?
translation.zh: 狗屁全球变暖！这是谁办的好事？

translation.en: Uh, man.
translation.zh: 男人

translation.en: And wo-man.
translation.zh: 还有女人

translation.en: One thing I've learned growing up in the mossy savannas of Alabama
translation.zh: 我在阿拉巴马州苔藓稀树草原的成长过程中学到一件事

translation.en: is if you've seen one June bug,
translation.zh: 如果看到一只六月甲虫

translation.en: there's more than likely 500 more waiting in the wings.
translation.zh: 可能还有500多只等待登场呢

translation.en: -We've seen this before. -Five times is what I have heard.
translation.zh: -我们以前见过这玩意-我听说你们见过五次

translation.en: Why are we going towards the dinosaurs? That's where the danger is!
translation.zh: 我们为什么要朝着恐龙的方向前进？那里是危险所在！

translation.en: Oh, no. That sounds like a baby crying for its mama.
translation.zh: 不 听起来像是宝宝在呼唤妈妈

translation.en: That ain't no baby!
translation.zh: 才不是什么宝宝！

translation.en: My God, what are we gonna do?
translation.zh: 天啊 我们该怎么做？

translation.en: Somebody help him!
translation.zh: 快帮帮他！

translation.en: [man 1] Drop him!
translation.zh: 把他放下来！

translation.en: Hang in there!
translation.zh: 坚持住！

translation.en: How does he fly? He has no feathers!
translation.zh: 它是怎么飞起来的？它没有羽毛！

translation.en: Well, somebody taught him how to fly!
translation.zh: 有人教它飞的！

translation.en: [man 2] Please stop!
translation.zh: 快停下！

translation.en: It's okay. I got him!
translation.zh: 没事 我去救他！

translation.en: [Darren] All right, cut!
translation.zh: 好了 卡！

translation.en: -Great work. -[bell ringing]
translation.zh: 很棒

translation.en: -That was a great take. -Moving on.
translation.zh: -刚才拍得很好-拍下一条

translation.en: -Oh, um, Sean? -Yeah?
translation.zh: -肖恩？-什么事？

translation.en: Did you have a chance to read the screenplay I sent you?
translation.zh: 你看过我寄给你的剧本了吗？

translation.en: Oh. They're bringing me down. I'm sorry, buddy.
translation.zh: 他们要放我下去了 抱歉 伙计

translation.en: -Oh, I can still hear you. -[Sean] One second. Getting unplugged.
translation.zh: -我还是能听到你说话-等等 我要解开绳子

translation.en: Darren, one note before we move on?
translation.zh: 达伦 拍下一条前给你提个建议好吗？

translation.en: I don't get when Dolly says, "Somebody taught him how to fly."
translation.zh: 我不理解多莉说“有人教它飞的”是什么意思

translation.en: They're cliff beasts. It's in their DNA. That's what they do. They fly.
translation.zh: 它们是悬崖野兽 这是它们的本性它们天性如此 它们会飞

translation.en: You can't rewrite my lines. You're not the writer.
translation.zh: 你不能重改我的台词 你不是编剧

translation.en: But it goes against dinosaur logic.
translation.zh: 但是这和恐龙逻辑相悖！

translation.en: Why are you rewriting the script? We have a writer. Aren't you an actor?
translation.zh: 你为什么要重写剧本？我们有编剧 你不是演员吗？

translation.en: Yes, but I'm also the guardian of the franchise.
translation.zh: 对 但我也是系列电影的守护者

translation.en: -So I'm rewriting it. -We have somebody.
translation.zh: -所以我才重写-我们有专业人士

translation.en: Can we play to the top of our audience's intelligence?
translation.zh: 我们不要低估观众的智商 好吗？

translation.en: No, our audience is down here. They're kids. That's our audience.
translation.zh: 不 我们的观众智商不高就是孩子而已 他们是我们的观众

translation.en: Don't listen to him. He doesn't want me to have the big crowd-applause line.
translation.zh: 别听他的 他就是不想让我说让观众拍手叫绝的台词

translation.en: Lauren, all of your lines will be big applause lines
translation.zh: 劳伦 你所有台词都会让观众拍手叫绝

translation.en: if movie theaters ever open again.
translation.zh: 如果电影院能重开的话

translation.en: Carol hates the writing too.
translation.zh: 卡罗尔也很讨厌台词

translation.en: What? Carol?
translation.zh: 什么？卡罗尔？

translation.en: Lauren, that was private!
translation.zh: 劳伦 这是我们之间的私事！

translation.en: Plus, I also didn't say it.
translation.zh: 而且 我也没那么说

translation.en: That is exactly why I asked them not to bring you back after you bailed.
translation.zh: 所以我才叫他们别在你退出后把你找回来

translation.en: -I didn't bail. Am I getting coffee? -[man] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 我没有退出 有咖啡吗？

translation.en: -He doesn't know what he's doing. -What are you doing?
translation.zh: -他自己心里压根就没数-你在做什么？

translation.en: Covering your mic so people can't hear us.
translation.zh: 捂住你的麦克风大家就听不到我们讲话了

translation.en: I know. I do feel like my dialogue is a little lackluster.
translation.zh: 我知道 我确实觉得自己的对话有点平淡

translation.en: So let me fix it. Let me punch it up.
translation.zh: 交给我 让我润色一下

translation.en: -Can you do that? -I can punch it up.
translation.zh: -你能做到吗？-我可以润色

translation.en: Let me take care of you.
translation.zh: 让我来照顾你

translation.en: How are you gonna take care of me?
translation.zh: 你要怎么照顾我？

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna start dialogue-wise,
translation.zh: 我会从对话开始

translation.en: and then, you know, move on from there, I guess?
translation.zh: 然后延伸到其他方面？

translation.en: -You're gonna… punch me up? -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 你会…“滋润”一下我吗？ 好呀

translation.en: Guys, if you make any changes to the script, can you just cc me on it?
translation.zh: 两位 如果你们对剧本有什么改动能抄送我一份吗？

translation.en: At least?
translation.zh: 最起码这么做？

translation.en: [softly] "Guardian of the franchise"? Assholes. I won Sundance!
translation.zh: “系列电影的守护者”？一群混蛋 我可是拿过圣丹斯奖！

translation.en: -What's the point of us being up here? -Eyelines. So they know where to look.
translation.zh: -把我们吊在这里有什么意义？-基线 这样他们就知道看哪了

translation.en: Pretty cool.
translation.zh: 很酷的

translation.en: ♪ Why do birds suddenly appear ♪
translation.zh: 为什么鸟儿 忽然出现

translation.en: ♪ Every time you are near? ♪
translation.zh: 在你每一次靠近时？

translation.en: ♪ Just like me ♪
translation.zh: 就像我一样

translation.en: ♪ They long to be ♪
translation.zh: 它们一直盼望着

translation.en: ♪ Close to you… ♪
translation.zh: 靠近你

translation.en: And you and you.
translation.zh: 你 你还有你

translation.en: -What's this? [laughs] -What's the next bit?
translation.zh: -下面呢？-下一段是什么？

translation.en: Hey, guys. Just listen up for a second.
translation.zh: 嘿 大家听我说一下

translation.en: We have had a situation on set
translation.zh: 片场出了个小状况

translation.en: that means we're going to shut down production
translation.zh: 也就是说 我们要停止拍摄

translation.en: and go back into quarantine.
translation.zh: 继续隔离了

translation.en: That's not even funny.
translation.zh: 一点都不好笑

translation.en: Screw you, Gavin. That's hilarious, man.
translation.zh: 去你的吧 加文 真好笑

translation.en: I wish I was joking, but I'm not. You all have to go back to your rooms.
translation.zh: 我也希望自己是在开玩笑 但不是的你们必须返回自己的房间

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: We had a positive test on set,
translation.zh: 片场有个阳性患者

translation.en: and although I am forbidden from telling you who it was,
translation.zh: 虽然我被禁止告诉你们这人是谁

translation.en: let's just say it's the girl who gets your coffees.
translation.zh: 但其实是早上给你们取咖啡的女孩

translation.en: Um, her name's Wendy.
translation.zh: 她叫温迪

translation.en: That creepy PA?
translation.zh: 那个恶心的制片助理？

translation.en: Yeah, production were trying to be safe by sending one person to get the coffees,
translation.zh: 对 制片本来是为了安全才让一个人去取所有咖啡

translation.en: when in fact that led to Wendy touching about 80 coffee cups this morning.
translation.zh: 但这实际上导致了温迪今早接触了大约80杯咖啡

translation.en: We're gonna die.
translation.zh: 我们要死了

translation.en: -No, we're not gonna die! Howie. -[actors clamoring]
translation.zh: 不 我们不会死的！豪伊

translation.en: Is this how it always goes?
translation.zh: 向来都是这样吗？

translation.en: No, this is a shit show.
translation.zh: 不是 这就是个灾难

translation.en: -Guys, calm down! -Oi!
translation.zh: -大家冷静一下！-嘿！

translation.en: [emotionally] I am a mother, so I have to go!
translation.zh: 我是个母亲 所以我必须走！

translation.en: Or I need a larger room.
translation.zh: 或者给我个大点儿的房间

translation.en: If I could just switch rooms with Howie,
translation.zh: 如果我可以和豪伊换房间的话

translation.en: because he has the tub, and I have only a shower!
translation.zh: 因为他房间有浴缸 我只有淋浴头！

translation.en: [Howie] Yeah, but in Pakistan, you ain't shit!
translation.zh: 但是在巴基斯坦 你屁都不算！

translation.en: Okay, guys, listen, okay? I have had the virus three times, okay?
translation.zh: 好了 各位 听着 好吗？我感染过三次病毒 好吗？

translation.en: And the first time, I didn't even notice it.
translation.zh: 第一次我都没察觉出来

translation.en: Second time, was in a coma.
translation.zh: 第二次 我陷入了昏迷

translation.en: The third time, I lost my sense of sort of taste and smell
translation.zh: 第三次 我失去了味觉和嗅觉

translation.en: and how I felt about people.
translation.zh: 还有对人的感觉

translation.en: Trust me, that is something that you want to avoid.
translation.zh: 相信我 这是你们想避免的东西

translation.en: I think he's still sick.
translation.zh: 我觉得他还没康复

translation.en: I can't wear rings anymore
translation.zh: 而且 我也不能戴戒指了

translation.en: because my fingers change size every single day.
translation.zh: 因为我的指围每天都会变

translation.en: I can't do this, man. I can't stay in my room any longer on my own.
translation.zh: 我做不到我不能再自己一个人待在房间了

translation.en: If you make me, I'll fuck my chair!
translation.zh: 如果你们逼我 我就上我的椅子！

translation.en: No. Look, guys, we're here for you.
translation.zh: 不 大家听着 有我们在

translation.en: So don't worry. Once you're all back in your rooms,
translation.zh: 所以不用担心 一旦你们都回到房间

translation.en: we're gonna take great care of you.
translation.zh: 我们会好好照顾你们

translation.en: You have to go into your room too.
translation.zh: 你也必须回房间

translation.en: -Why? -You had a latte.
translation.zh: -为什么？-你喝了杯拿铁

translation.en: -Oh, fuck! -I know.
translation.zh: -该死！-我明白

translation.en: So how are you feeling about the new quarantine?
translation.zh: 你对新一轮隔离有什么看法？

translation.en: -[people clamoring] -Really? Really?
translation.zh: 认真的吗？

translation.en: -Sorry, when would be a good time-- -Never.
translation.zh: -抱歉 什么时候合适…-永远都不会

translation.en: -Fuck off! -Perfect.
translation.zh: -滚开！-没问题

translation.en: It's ten seconds and we're done. Are you ready?
translation.zh: 十秒钟就好 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, let's go. Let's go.
translation.zh: 好了 来吧

translation.en: Fuck you! Fuck you, you fucking bastard!
translation.zh: 该死 你这狗杂种！

translation.en: I'm gonna kill you, and then I'm gonna murder your ghost!
translation.zh: 我要宰了你 我要把你的魂都灭了！

translation.en: That was not too bad.
translation.zh: 也没多痛嘛

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -I'll wait.
translation.zh: -很抱歉-我等着你

translation.en: -That's a little too deep. -[Gunther] It's better that way. I think…
translation.zh: -有点太深了-最好这样 我觉得…

translation.en: -Are you… Excuse me, are you all right? -[Gunther] Yes. Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: -你没…不好意思 你没事吧？-没事

translation.en: Fuck you! You're not gonna win! I am gonna win, you motherfucker!
translation.zh: 该死！你不会赢的！我会赢 你这王八蛋！

translation.en: "How many species have died because of man? Thousands!"
translation.zh: 有多少物种因为人类灭亡？成千上万种！

translation.en: "I think it's snack time. For them."
translation.zh: “现在应该是零食时间 对它们而言”

translation.en: [in ambiguous accent] "These cliff beasts are so large! How do they fly?"
translation.zh: 这些悬崖野兽好大！ 它们是怎么飞起来的？

translation.en: "How? How?"
translation.zh: 怎么飞起来的？

translation.en: "How do they fly?"
translation.zh: 它们是怎么飞起来的？

translation.en: "There's nothing left to eat but us."
translation.zh: “没有吃的了 只剩下我们！”

translation.en: "These cliff beasts are so large!"
translation.zh: 这些悬崖野兽好大！

translation.en: Sound idea for a cliff beast. Here's beast one.
translation.zh: 悬崖野兽的声音创意 这是一号野兽

translation.en: Swooping down.
translation.zh: 正在俯冲

translation.en: Mating.
translation.zh: 交配中

translation.en: Mourning the loss of a child.
translation.zh: 这是失去孩子的哀鸣

translation.en: Full rage.
translation.zh: 暴怒

translation.en: Mother, I can't do 13 more days of this!
translation.zh: 妈妈 我受不了再隔离13天了！

translation.en: I've already been doing this for 12 hours. It's too much!
translation.zh: 我已经隔离12个小时了 我受够了！

translation.en: Hey, guys, it's Krystal.
translation.zh: 嘿 大家好 我是克丽丝托

translation.en: Um, I'm back in quarantine in my room.
translation.zh: 我又回到自己的房间隔离了

translation.en: I'm gonna need a lot of movie suggestions,
translation.zh: 我会需要很多影片建议

translation.en: but I wanna watch more, like, dark stuff.
translation.zh: 但我更想看黑暗题材的

translation.en: Everyone told me to watch this movie, E.T.? Felt a little racist.
translation.zh: 大家都说让我看《E.T.外星人》？我感觉那片子有点种族歧视

translation.en: I don't wanna watch anything that'd offend my fans.
translation.zh: 我不想看冒犯到粉丝的电影

translation.en: I have respect for everybody that follows me.
translation.zh: 我尊重关注我的每个人

translation.en: Sean, you are not in competition with Krystal.
translation.zh: 肖恩 你不是在跟克丽丝托竞赛

translation.en: You are not aging. You don't need 100 million followers.
translation.zh: 你没有变老 你不需要一亿粉丝

translation.en: I am titanium!
translation.zh: 我是钛金属！

translation.en: I am invincible! Age is an illusion!
translation.zh: 我是不可战胜的！年龄只是幻觉！

translation.en: Time cannot catch me! Never die!
translation.zh: 时间追不上我！我永远不会死！

translation.en: [Howie] I need weed immediately! Buy a drone.
translation.zh: 我现在就需要大麻！买个无人机

translation.en: Attach my marijuana to the drone. Fly that shit through my fucking window!
translation.zh: 把我的大麻绑到无人机上然后让那玩意飞进我的窗户！

translation.en: "I just want a safe place for the dinosaurs to live!"
translation.zh: 我只是想给恐龙一个安全的生存空间！

translation.en: I really couldn't do this without you.
translation.zh: 没有你我真的过不下去

translation.en: I probably could do it without you, but that's just because I'm used to it.
translation.zh: 可能没有你我也能待下去但那只是因为我习惯了

translation.en: This is the first time I've left Indiana.
translation.zh: 这是我第一次离开印第安纳

translation.en: So did you, like, audition for the movie or what?
translation.zh: 你是参加了这部电影的试镜吗？

translation.en: I think they just jammed me in this movie because I have a lot of followers.
translation.zh: 我觉得是他们硬把我塞进电影里因为我有很多粉丝

translation.en: Must be fun having 100 million followers.
translation.zh: 有一亿粉丝一定很好玩

translation.en: Sometimes I just want a break,
translation.zh: 有时候我只想休息一下

translation.en: but my mom just tells me if I don't keep putting out content,
translation.zh: 但我妈妈告诉我如果我不持续输出内容

translation.en: then everybody's just gonna forget about me, so…
translation.zh: 大家就会忘记我 所以…

translation.en: I can help you if you want.
translation.zh: 如果你想的话 我可以帮你

translation.en: You know, I've never had a normal friend.
translation.zh: 我从来没交过正常的朋友

translation.en: No one's ever called me normal before.
translation.zh: 从来没人说过我正常

translation.en: Why are you laughing?
translation.zh: 你为什么要笑？

translation.en: You're such a freak.
translation.zh: 你真是个怪胎

translation.en: [Sean] Whoo! I'm doing it, son!
translation.zh: 我做到了 真爽！

translation.en: This is awesome!
translation.zh: 太棒了！

translation.en: Gavin, buddy, can you hear me?
translation.zh: 加文 兄弟 你能听到我说话吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 能

translation.en: This is all I'm doing? I'm just going up?
translation.zh: 我只能这样做吗？只能这样往上飞吗？

translation.en: You're only allowed to learn how to go up.
translation.zh: 剧组只允许你学会往上飞

translation.en: That's all we need for the shot in the movie.
translation.zh: 我们的电影只需要上升镜头

translation.en: [Sean] If I can go forward just even a little bit,
translation.zh: 如果我能往前开一点

translation.en: my fans, they will shit their dicks.
translation.zh: 我的粉丝们肯定会激动得尿裤子

translation.en: Gavin, is this safe? Why is he doing this?
translation.zh: 加文 这样安全吗？他为什么要这样？

translation.en: He wouldn't do the movie unless we let him do this.
translation.zh: 如果我们不让他开飞机他就不拍电影

translation.en: How exciting is it to direct a movie with a $100 million budget?
translation.zh: 导演一部预算一亿美元的电影有多激动人心呢？

translation.en: It's a lot of pressure.
translation.zh: 我压力山大

translation.en: Well, it would be a lot of pressure if the cast wasn't so brilliant.
translation.zh: 如果演员不怎么出色当然会压力山大

translation.en: See you later, buddy.
translation.zh: 稍后见 伙计

translation.en: Are you worried people won't watch a movie about dinosaurs,
translation.zh: 鉴于全球疫情的严峻形势

translation.en: given the serious nature of the global pandemic?
translation.zh: 你会担心人们不想看恐龙题材的电影吗？

translation.en: Hey, are you being a fly on the wall?
translation.zh: 嘿 你在进行纪实拍摄吗？

translation.en: You're a pretty noisy fucking fly! I can hardly hear the helicopter!
translation.zh: 你是一只很吵的苍蝇！我都听不到直升机的声音了！

translation.en: Sorry, just doing my job.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我只是在尽到工作义务

translation.en: What job is that? Trying to get in my fucking head?
translation.zh: 这算什么工作 跟我斗智吗？

translation.en: Like he wants me to fail!
translation.zh: 他好像盼着我失败呢！

translation.en: Don't let him mess with your focus. Everybody wants you to fail.
translation.zh: 别让他打乱你的注意力大家都想看你失败

translation.en: Don't give a fuck about him.
translation.zh: 不要在乎他

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -Where's Ronjon? -You asked for a tray table to be removed.
translation.zh: -荣乔呢？-你说需要人撤走餐桌

translation.en: I said send Ronjon.
translation.zh: 我说了让荣乔来

translation.en: You wanted sex, but you will get love.
translation.zh: 你想要性 但你会得到爱

translation.en: Hold on.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: Isn't that nice?
translation.zh: 这样不好吗？

translation.en: You don't know me!
translation.zh: 你不了解我！

translation.en: Am I a great director?
translation.zh: 我是一名优秀的导演吗？

translation.en: Yes, of course you are.
translation.zh: 是啊 你当然是了

translation.en: You have a vision.
translation.zh: 你有远见

translation.en: -Yeah, I think I do. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -对 我觉得我有-没错

translation.en: So what do I do when Dustin keeps trying to rewrite the script?
translation.zh: 达斯汀一直想要重写剧本我该怎么做？

translation.en: When he tells you his ideas, tell him you'll think about them,
translation.zh: 如果他跟你说了自己的想法告诉他 你会仔细考虑

translation.en: and then never get back to him.
translation.zh: 然后永远不给他回馈

translation.en: You do that to me.
translation.zh: 你就是这样对我的

translation.en: No, with you, I'm actually thinking.
translation.zh: 不 我真的思考了你的建议

translation.en: I'm just playing around.
translation.zh: 我开玩笑的

translation.en: Making movies is fun!
translation.zh: 拍电影很有意思！

translation.en: That's why we do it!
translation.zh: 所以我们才拍电影！

translation.en: I'm sorry I skipped your mom's funeral to go to the People's Choice Awards.
translation.zh: 我为了参加人民选择奖颁奖典礼没能出席你妈妈的葬礼 真的很抱歉

translation.en: I'm sorry that I
translation.zh: 很抱歉我

translation.en: burned down your back office.
translation.zh: 烧掉了你的后勤办公室

translation.en: I'm sorry I slept with your agent.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我和你的经纪人睡了

translation.en: -Sorry that-- -And your manager.
translation.zh: -很抱歉…-还有你的经理人

translation.en: And your divorce lawyer.
translation.zh: 还有你的离婚律师

translation.en: -Yeah. -Uh…
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I'm sorry I gave up on us.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我放弃了我们

translation.en: [sighs] Why is it always so hard?
translation.zh: 为什么总是这么难呢？

translation.en: [sighs] I think 'cause you're so strong. You're so intimidating. So talented.
translation.zh: 我觉得是因为你太强势你让人心生畏惧 你太有才华了

translation.en: I feel like nobody would be able to fix the script the way you do
translation.zh: 我觉得没人能像你那样修改剧本

translation.en: and stay in such incredible shape.
translation.zh: 而且保持这样完美的身材

translation.en: And you
translation.zh: 你是

translation.en: are an amazing mother.
translation.zh: 一位优秀的母亲

translation.en: -Take me to the peak! -We are on a mountain!
translation.zh: -带我到顶峰！-我们在山上！

translation.en: -Ooh. I think I see one of the crew. -Oh, shit. Get…
translation.zh: -我好像看到剧组的人了-该死 赶紧…

translation.en: Uh, so how is the major motion picture going?
translation.zh: 大电影拍得怎么样了？

translation.en: It's fine. Everybody's just old.
translation.zh: 还行吧 大家都上年纪了

translation.en: Is there somebody cute there?
translation.zh: 那里有没有帅哥？

translation.en: -[chuckling] -Who you maybe wanna smooch with?
translation.zh: 你想和谁亲亲？

translation.en: Don't be gross, Mom! God!
translation.zh: 别这么恶心 妈妈！天啊！

translation.en: Is Timmy-thee Oilyphant there? Oh.
translation.zh: 提莫西奥丽芬特在吗？

translation.en: -No! -I could…
translation.zh: -没有！-我可以…

translation.en: Why are you saying it like that? That's not his name!
translation.zh: 你为什么要这样说？他名字不是这样的！

translation.en: But I wish he was here. I do. He's very cute.
translation.zh: 但我好希望他在 真的 他太帅了

translation.en: Oh. Are you nervous to meet the dinosaurs during your act?
translation.zh: 拍摄的时候 你见到恐龙会紧张吗？

translation.en: Mom, they're not real!
translation.zh: 妈妈 恐龙不是真的！

translation.en: They, like… They put them in after.
translation.zh: 他们后期会把恐龙放上去

translation.en: I thought there was an elephant wearing a mask or something.
translation.zh: 我还以为会有戴着面具的大象什么的

translation.en: I wish you were here. I'm so lonely.
translation.zh: 真希望你在这里 我好孤单

translation.en: Come on! [huffs]
translation.zh: 不是吧！

translation.en: -Oh! Jesus! [grunts] -You okay?
translation.zh: -天啊！-你没事吧？

translation.en: -I'm fine! -Let me check.

translation.en: that might help solve the issues."
