translation.zh: 我要打完这局游戏 再见！

translation.en: Rafi!
translation.zh: 拉斐！

translation.en: What a nightmare!
translation.zh: 真是个噩梦！

translation.en: -Ever wonder if we picked the right kid? -Don't say that.
translation.zh: -你有没有怀疑过我们挑错了孩子？-别这么说

translation.en: No, when we got him, they said he was just shy and that he'd warm up,
translation.zh: 不 我们领养他时 他们说他就是害羞会跟我们亲近起来

translation.en: but he never warmed up--
translation.zh: 但他一直跟我们亲近不起来…

translation.en: [Rafi] I can hear you!
translation.zh: 我能听到你们说话！

translation.en: Man, you guys are a bag full of dicks!
translation.zh: 你们俩就是彻彻底底的混蛋！

translation.en: Fuck!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: That was…
translation.zh: 真是…

translation.en: There's no coming back from that.
translation.zh: 没有回头路了

translation.en: I don't think we're allowed to leave the hotel. I signed something.
translation.zh: 我们应该不能离开酒店 我签合同了

translation.en: We're 18. They expect us to do this.
translation.zh: 我们18岁了 他们有心理准备

translation.en: Okay, let's go to London.
translation.zh: 好 那我们去伦敦吧

translation.en: Make me smile.
translation.zh: 让我开心吧

translation.en: Hello, I'm Kate.
translation.zh: 大家好 我是凯特

translation.en: Welcome to your 30-minute morning stretch.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到你的30分钟晨间拉伸

translation.en: Are you ready to start a new day with new habits?
translation.zh: 准备好以新的习惯开始新的一天了吗？

translation.en: Change me. Change me.
translation.zh: 改变我吧

translation.en: -Great! -Change me.
translation.zh: -很好！-改变我

translation.en: I'm ready too.
translation.zh: 我也准备好了

translation.en: Let's go. We're just gonna start with a really easy swing.
translation.zh: 来吧 我们先从一个简单的摇摆开始

translation.en: No stress. Great.
translation.zh: 放松 很好

translation.en: Let's come down.
translation.zh: 我们坐下来

translation.en: Let's just take a moment to connect with the earth.
translation.zh: 花点时间和地球交流一下

translation.en: -Dieter. -Huh?
translation.zh: 迪特尔

translation.en: You're kind of cute.
translation.zh: 你还挺帅的

translation.en: I like your hair.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的头发

translation.en: For our next exercise,
translation.zh: 下个动作

translation.en: I would like you to enter me for 30 thrusts.
translation.zh: 我想让你进入我的身体30次

translation.en: Let's do that ten times,
translation.zh: 我们来做十组

translation.en: and continue until I say we're done.
translation.zh: 我说停才可以停

translation.en: That's a lot of sets.
translation.zh: 十组太多了

translation.en: -[both panting] -I love you, Dr. Lacie.
translation.zh: 我爱你 蕾西医生

translation.en: I love you too. But it's Carol.
translation.zh: 我也爱你 但我是卡罗尔

translation.en: [moans] Carol Lacie.
translation.zh: 卡罗尔蕾西

translation.en: -No, just Carol! -[both gasp]
translation.zh: 不 我就叫卡罗尔！

translation.en: Dr. Carol.
translation.zh: 卡罗尔医生

translation.en: -No, I'm not a doctor. -[grunts]
translation.zh: 不 我不是医生

translation.en: Kate?
translation.zh: 凯特？

translation.en: Are you me?
translation.zh: 你是我吗？

translation.en: I'm you. You're me. I'm horny. Who cares?
translation.zh: 我就是你 你就是我我很饥渴 有什么区别？

translation.en: This is creepy, but I like it.
translation.zh: 好诡异 但是我好喜欢

translation.en: Shut up. Get over here.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 给我过来

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: 遵命 女士

translation.en: I don't understand!
translation.zh: 我听不懂！

translation.en: Did you?
translation.zh: 你到了？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: I never orgasm.
translation.zh: 我永远不会射

translation.en: [Kate, repeating] Are you ready to start a new day?
translation.zh: 准备好开始新的一天了吗？

translation.en: [Dieter] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 很抱歉

translation.en: Ronjon, make sure you spend time on that pineapple. Each groove.
translation.zh: 荣乔 一定好好处理这个菠萝每个凹陷都照顾到

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: I think I'm sick.
translation.zh: 我好像生病了

translation.en: Yeah, you're sick with love.
translation.zh: 对 你得相思病了

translation.en: No, I think it's the virus.
translation.zh: 不 我觉得是病毒

translation.en: You can't have the virus. We're in the bubble.
translation.zh: 你不可能感染病毒 我们都在泡泡里

translation.en: Bola, hold my hair.
translation.zh: 博拉 抓住我的头发

translation.en: Your hair is short. There is no hair to hold!
translation.zh: 你是短头发 没有头发可抓！

translation.en: [groaning] Hold my hair!
translation.zh: 抓住我的头发！

translation.en: Uh, I don't want to be here. I want to resign.
translation.zh: 我不想在这里了 我想辞职

translation.en: [sobbing] Bola…
translation.zh: 博拉…

translation.en: [hesitates] I really don't want to.
translation.zh: 我真的不想

translation.en: -I'm not supposed to be here. -[sobs] Bola…
translation.zh: -我不该在这里-博拉…

translation.en: Where do I hold? Okay!
translation.zh: 我该抓哪里？好吧！

translation.en: [Bola] No! No, no, no, no!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: [Gavin] Okay, guys? Uh, listen up.
translation.zh: 好了 各位？听着

translation.en: Uh, I've got some very important health news for you.
translation.zh: 我要宣布一个很重要的健康消息

translation.en: -You all tested negative for the virus. -Yes!
translation.zh: -你们的核酸检测结果都是阴性-太好了！

translation.en: However, some of you have tested positive for influenza.
translation.zh: 然而有些人得了流行感冒

translation.en: -The good virus. -[Gunther] The good one.
translation.zh: 这是无害的病毒 无害的 没错

translation.en: Two of you tested positive
translation.zh: 有两个人是流感阳性

translation.en: for two separate cases of sexually transmitted diseases.
translation.zh: 是两个单独的性传播病例

translation.en: How'd we get the flu? We're in the bubble.
translation.zh: 我们怎么可能得流感呢？我们被隔离了

translation.en: [Gavin] We've narrowed it down to a delivery person
translation.zh: 我们已经把范围缩小到快递员

translation.en: and one of the gardeners. We are handling it.
translation.zh: 和一个园丁了 我们正在解决

translation.en: If this is just the normal flu,
translation.zh: 如果只是普通的感冒

translation.en: we could push on and complete the day, right?
translation.zh: 我们应该可以继续推进完成今天的拍摄 对吗？

translation.en: Absolutely, yeah.
translation.zh: 当然可以

translation.en: Actors are some of the toughest people I know. We can handle it.
translation.zh: 演员们都是最坚强的人我知道我们可以应对

translation.en: I once played host to a 30-foot-long tapeworm
translation.zh: 一只九米的绦虫曾经寄生在我身上

translation.en: during Cliff Beasts 2, and nobody even knew.
translation.zh: 在《悬崖野兽2》的时候都没有人知道

translation.en: I broke my wrist and ankle on the last movie I did.
translation.zh: 我拍上一部电影时手腕和脚踝都断了

translation.en: -I didn't tell anybody. -Good lad. That's the spirit.
translation.zh: -我没告诉任何人-好孩子 就是这种精神

translation.en: I'm very concerned about Carol and Dieter.
translation.zh: 我很担心卡罗尔和迪特尔

translation.en: I think they should at least have the rest of the day off.
translation.zh: 我觉得他们今天至少应该休息

translation.en: We're not shutting this down for a bit of snot.
translation.zh: 听着 我们不能因为一点小感冒就停止拍摄

translation.en: Let's have a show of hands, okay? Who wants to power through today?
translation.zh: 我们举手表决一下 好吗？谁今天想挺过去？

translation.en: Right, let's get out there and kill some cliff beasts!
translation.zh: 好的 我们去山上杀几头悬崖野兽吧！

translation.en: -[actors] Yeah! -Yes!
translation.zh: -好的！-好棒！

translation.en: I can hear something!
translation.zh: 我听到了一些声音！

translation.en: The nest must be close.
translation.zh: 巢穴一定就在附近

translation.en: You guys better get moving, or you're gonna be bird seed.
translation.zh: 你们最好快点爬 否则就会变成鸟粮

translation.en: I don't feel so good.
translation.zh: 我感觉不太舒服

translation.en: We should do this another day.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们应该改天再拍

translation.en: -You got this. -[Dustin] Lauren?
translation.zh: -你可以的-劳伦？

translation.en: -[sighs] -Lauren!
translation.zh: 劳伦！

translation.en: Something's up with Lauren.
translation.zh: 劳伦不对劲

translation.en: I can't do this anymore.
translation.zh: 我没劲爬了

translation.en: [Carol] Oh, my God, I'm gonna throw up.
translation.zh: 天啊 我要吐了

translation.en: [Krystal] Please don't because then I will too.
translation.zh: 千万别 因为你吐我也会想吐

translation.en: Winners never quit, and quitters never win!
translation.zh: 成功者绝不会放弃放弃者绝不会成功！

translation.en: I don't wanna act anymore. I wanna go back to the room.
translation.zh: 我不想演了 我想回房间

translation.en: Let's shoot it quickly. You'll be proud when it's done.
translation.zh: 我们快点拍 拍完后你会很有自豪感

translation.en: Carol, can you stop gaslighting me?
translation.zh: 卡罗尔 能别对我“煤气灯操纵”吗？

translation.en: Gaslighting? That is not gaslighting. You know what? Your generation sucks!
translation.zh: “煤气灯操纵”？这不是煤气灯操纵知道吗？你们这代人烂透了！

translation.en: At least I'm not a baby boomer.
translation.zh: 至少我没在婴儿潮的时候出生

translation.en: I'm not a baby boomer. I am Generation Y, thank you very much.
translation.zh: 我不是婴儿潮期间出生的我是Y世代 十分感谢

translation.en: Ladies, this is no time for catfighting.
translation.zh: 女士们 你俩就别斗嘴了

translation.en: I saw a photo of you at a Nirvana concert.
translation.zh: 我看到了你在涅槃演唱会上的照片

translation.en: [scoffs] No, you didn't. That wasn't me.
translation.zh: 不 你没有 那不是我

translation.en: It doesn't look like they're climbing.
translation.zh: 他们好像没有在爬山

translation.en: Right, like, why don't they have ropes?
translation.zh: 对 他们身上怎么没系绳索？

translation.en: And would they let the little girl free climb a cliff like this?
translation.zh: 他们怎么会让那个小女孩自由攀登悬崖？

translation.en: Would she even know how to do it?
translation.zh: 她知道怎么爬吗？

translation.en: -I think she's unconscious. -I think Lauren seems fine.
translation.zh: -我觉得她没意识了-我觉得劳伦没什么大碍

translation.en: Wake up, Lauren. Come on. Climb.
translation.zh: 醒醒 劳伦 快点 继续爬

translation.en: For your first time free climbing, you're doing a great job, guys!
translation.zh: 这是你们第一次自由攀登你们爬得很不错 各位！

translation.en: Okay, guys, I really think I'm gonna throw up.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 我真觉得我要吐了

translation.en: [Dustin] Maybe call the set medic?
translation.zh: 或许我们应该找片场医务人员？

translation.en: I don't like it when people throw up.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢看别人吐

translation.en: Oh, God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -Should we bring them down? -Let's just see how it plays out.
translation.zh: -我们要把他们放下来吗？-看看接下来会怎样吧

translation.en: Should we be concerned about this level of vomit? Just 'cause, you know…
translation.zh: 这种程度的呕吐我们要担心吗？因为…

translation.en: There's something going round.
translation.zh: 大家都感染上了

translation.en: -[Bola] It smells like ham or something. -Shh. It's okay.
translation.zh: 闻起来像火腿什么的

translation.en: I need touch-ups on hair and makeup, please!
translation.zh: 我需要整理妆发 拜托！

translation.en: -[stomach gurgling] -Can hair and makeup step in, please?
translation.zh: 能给我整理一下妆发吗 谢谢？

translation.en: Hey, Lauren? Who would you say is the most fun person to act with?
translation.zh: 嘿 劳伦？你觉得谁是最有趣的搭档？

translation.en: Gavin, there's no time for recuperation.
translation.zh: 加文 没时间让他们恢复了

translation.en: You have to get the dinosaurs flying again.
translation.zh: 你必须让恐龙再次起飞

translation.en: -I'm not a magician. -I know you're not a fucking magician!
translation.zh: -宝拉 我不是魔术师！-我知道你不是魔术师！

translation.en: If you were, you could pull a movie out of your ass!
translation.zh: 如果你是 早就把电影拉出来了！

translation.en: Oh, my God, it's Minnie Driver. [gasps] I love her.
translation.zh: 天啊 是明妮德里弗 我好爱她

translation.en: You know, these are human beings. They're not machines.
translation.zh: 他们是人 不是机器

translation.en: Bucko, need I remind you, you used to be addicted to meth.
translation.zh: 小伙子 需要我提醒你吗？你以前吸冰毒上瘾

translation.en: Once you stayed up for three weeks, did something bad, and I covered for you.
translation.zh: 有一次你三个星期都没睡觉 做了件很过分的事情我替你瞒了下来

translation.en: Okay, yes, I remember. Thank you for reminding me, Paula.
translation.zh: 是的 我记得 谢谢你提醒我 宝拉

translation.en: If I'd ever told anyone, you'd be in jail for the rest of your life.
translation.zh: 如果我告诉别人你后半辈子都会在牢里度过

translation.en: Don't make me get tough. I don't like to get tough.
translation.zh: 别让我狠起心来 我不喜欢来硬的

translation.en: You do like being tough. You love it.
translation.zh: 你喜欢来硬的 你很喜欢

translation.en: Can I put something into perspective for you?
translation.zh: 你听我分析一下 好吗？

translation.en: We are one of two movies in production right now.
translation.zh: 现在只有两部电影在拍我们是其中一部

translation.en: -It's us and Tom Cruise. -[Gavin] Yeah.
translation.zh: -另一部是汤姆克鲁斯-好的

translation.en: If we fail, a $50 billion corporation is going to go down.
translation.zh: 如果我们失败了一家市值500亿美元的公司就会破产

translation.en: People murder each other over ten grand.
translation.zh: 人们会为了一万美元互相残杀

translation.en: What do you think they're gonna do over $50 billion?
translation.zh: 你觉得如果是500亿美元他们会做出什么事来？

translation.en: You ass! [gasps]
translation.zh: 你这个混蛋！

translation.en: Oh, dear.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Okay, so Mel Gibson is on the boat, and I think he thinks we're dating.
translation.zh: 好吧 梅尔吉布森在船上他好像认为我们在约会

translation.en: We did stuff last night. He's taking it too seriously.
translation.zh: 我们昨晚做了一件事他现在有点过于认真了

translation.en: What did you do?
translation.zh: 你们做了什么？

translation.en: Just over-the-pants stuff.
translation.zh: 就裤裆里的那点事

translation.en: Guy, what's up?
translation.zh: 你好啊

translation.en: Oh! Listen! I've got so many presents for you.
translation.zh: 听着！我有很多礼物要给你

translation.en: These people, they don't even care about what they have.
translation.zh: 这些人根本不在乎自己有什么

translation.en: Yeah, I've got soap. I've got cream.
translation.zh: 对 我有香皂 还有面霜

translation.en: I've got… You need a corkscrew? I'm gonna send you two corkscrews.
translation.zh: 我还有…你需要开瓶器吗？我要给你寄两个开瓶器

translation.en: There's Bibles everywhere, in every room. They don't even read them!
translation.zh: 到处都是《圣经》 所有房间都有他们都不读！

translation.en: I'm gonna send it to you so we can pray for them 'cause they're all going to hell.
translation.zh: 我要把这些书寄给你 我们就可以为他们祈祷了 因为他们都会下地狱

translation.en: -They're mistreating you. -Mmm.
translation.zh: 他们这样委屈你

translation.en: Makes me furious.
translation.zh: 这让我怒火中烧

translation.en: You know what you need to do?
translation.zh: 你知道自己该怎么做吗？

translation.en: You need to lead a revolution.
translation.zh: 你需要领导革命

translation.en: Yes, revolution.
translation.zh: 对 革命

translation.en: You're like little cogs in the machine. Don't you see it?
translation.zh: 你们就像机器上的小齿轮你看不出来吗？

translation.en: They've been using you!
translation.zh: 他们一直在利用你们！

translation.en: You're going to burn down the machinery of corporate capitalism.
translation.zh: 你们将摧毁公司资本主义的机器

translation.en: -Yes. -They are not the power.
translation.zh: -对-他们不该有权力

translation.en: You are the power! Only you can make the change!
translation.zh: 权力应该在你手中！只有你能做出改变！

translation.en: It has to be me!
translation.zh: 必须是我！

translation.en: It has to be you.
translation.zh: 一定是你

translation.en: We are working too many hours, and we are way over schedule.
translation.zh: 我们工作时间太长了我们的拍摄已经超出计划了

translation.en: It is unfair and unsafe.
translation.zh: 这不公平 也不安全

translation.en: Carol, why do you want us to bail? Just tell us why.
translation.zh: 卡罗尔 你为什么想让我们造反呢？告诉我们原因

translation.en: I'm not saying "bail." I'm saying "threaten to bail."
translation.zh: 我没说要“造反”我说的是“威胁造反”

translation.en: We're all gonna team up together, like the cast of Friends?
translation.zh: 我们要像《老友记》的演员们一样团结起来吗？

translation.en: -No. -You want us to bribe them then?
translation.zh: -不-那你是想让我们贿赂他们吗？

translation.en: -Not what I'm saying. -You want us to blackmail the studio.
translation.zh: -我不是这个意思-你想让我们勒索电影公司

translation.en: What are you not hearing?
translation.zh: 你们没在听吗？

translation.en: Every day, I eat the KitKat in the minibar,
translation.zh: 每天我都会吃一条小冰箱里的奇巧

translation.en: and then I come back and there's a new KitKat.
translation.zh: 然后我再去拿 就会有一条新的奇巧

translation.en: I'm not giving this up.
translation.zh: 我才不要放弃这福利！

translation.en: I knew she was gonna do this. I knew you were gonna do this.
translation.zh: 我就知道她会这样做我就知道你会这样做

translation.en: What did I tell everybody? Not to have her come back,
translation.zh: 我怎么跟大家说的？别让她回来

translation.en: because you are a leaver, and you are trying to get us to be leavers too.
translation.zh: 因为你是个中途离开的人你也想拉我们都做这种人

translation.en: -I thought you forgave me. -Did I?
translation.zh: -我还以为你原谅我了-我有吗？

translation.en: -You said you did. -Did I?
translation.zh: -你说过原谅我了-我有吗？

translation.en: -Lauren! -I just hadn't seen you in a while.
translation.zh: -劳伦！-那只是跟你客气一下

translation.en: Hey, little girl over there, why are you always here?
translation.zh: 嘿 那边的小姑娘你为什么一直跟着我们？

translation.en: My dad's the stunt coordinator.
translation.zh: 我爸爸是特技协调员

translation.en: He doesn't love me, so…
translation.zh: 他不爱我 所以…

translation.en: All right, uh, maybe we should vote on this.
translation.zh: 好吧 或许我们该投个票

translation.en: Okay, let's do it. Who's in?
translation.zh: 好的 来吧 谁赞成？

translation.en: This is great! Let's go make our demands!
translation.zh: 太好了！我们去提要求吧！

translation.en: No, we're in to finish the movie.
translation.zh: 不 我们赞成的是拍完电影

translation.en: That's not what I said! I said, "Are you in to be out of the movie?"
translation.zh: 我说的不是这个！我说的是“大家赞成退出电影吗？”

translation.en: Then you should have said out!
translation.zh: 那你应该说“谁要退出”！

translation.en: No. I explained the plan, and then I said, "Are you in for the plan?"
translation.zh: 不 我解释了计划 然后我说：“你们赞成这个计划吗？”

translation.en: Why would we listen to someone who doesn't know how voting works?
translation.zh: 我们为什么要听一个连投票规则都搞不懂的人？

translation.en: Guys, I am proud of you.
translation.zh: 各位 我非常为你们自豪

translation.en: Do you understand that, together, we can do anything?
translation.zh: 大家明白吗？团结起来 我们将无所不能

translation.en: And I'm manifesting right now, for all of us, a classic!
translation.zh: 我在给大家展示经典的煽动方式！

translation.en: -[Dustin] Yeah! -Yeah.
translation.zh: -耶！-好啊

translation.en: That's where it's at.
translation.zh: 应该是这样才对

translation.en: Hey, no, stop! This is not finished yet. You stole my meeting!
translation.zh: 嘿 打住！我还没说完呢你把我的会议抢走了！

translation.en: Cliff Beasts 6!
translation.zh: 《悬崖野兽6》！

translation.en: Mr. Best, is all this necessary?
translation.zh: 贝斯塔先生有必要搞这么大的阵仗吗？

translation.en: Maybe, maybe not.
translation.zh: 或许有 或许没有

translation.en: This is a hotel, not a war zone.
translation.zh: 这里是酒店 不是战区

translation.en: My job's to look after these people, not imprison them.
translation.zh: 我的职责是照看他们 不是囚禁他们

translation.en: You don't care about them. You just wanna get the job done!
translation.zh: 你不才在乎这些人你只想快点拍完电影！

translation.en: Like a sergeant pretends to care about the soldiers before he sends them off
translation.zh: 就像中士假装关心手下的士兵然后马上把他们送去战场

translation.en: to die.
translation.zh: 赴死

translation.en: Now, let's finish this film and go home!
translation.zh: 我们赶紧拍完电影 滚回家吧！

translation.en: -Hey, Gavin? -Hi.
translation.zh: -嘿 加文？-嗨

translation.en: What's going on? All my lines are gone from the next scene.
translation.zh: 怎么回事？我下个场景一句台词都没了

translation.en: Oh, that can't be true. She has lines in this, doesn't she?
translation.zh: 不可能 她有台词吧 对吗？

translation.en: Uh, only nonverbal lines.
translation.zh: 只有拟声的台词

translation.en: But I'm supposed to emotionally connect with the baby cliff beast.
translation.zh: 但是我应该和小悬崖野兽产生情感的

translation.en: Oh, yes! That's right. The studio wanted Krystal to do that because she's young.
translation.zh: 没错！电影公司想交给克丽丝托因为她年轻

translation.en: I'm young.
translation.zh: 我也年轻着呢

translation.en: They thought she'd connect more with the baby beast.
translation.zh: 他们觉得她会更容易和小野兽发生感情

translation.en: -[Carol scoffs] Why? -Well, she's the baby.
translation.zh: -为什么？-她自己就是个小孩

translation.en: And you're not now.
translation.zh: 你现在不是

translation.en: The studio know that you're overworked. And they heard you.
translation.zh: 电影公司知道你工作量太大了他们听到你的诉求了

translation.en: -What do you mean, "They heard me"? What? -They heard you.
translation.zh: -什么叫“他们听到我的诉求”了？-他们听到你的诉求了

translation.en: I got you now, you son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 终于等到你了 狗杂种

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不要

translation.en: Cole, put that goddamn gun down.
translation.zh: 科尔 把你的枪放下

translation.en: That baby dinosaur has just as much right to be on this planet as we do.
translation.zh: 这个小恐龙和我们一样有在这个星球生存的权利

translation.en: It's not about the planet.
translation.zh: 这和星球无关

translation.en: It's about justice!
translation.zh: 这事关公平！

translation.en: [Krystal] No, put it down!
translation.zh: 不 放下

translation.en: God damn it, Vivian.
translation.zh: 该死 薇薇安

translation.en: How can you be so naive?
translation.zh: 你怎么这么天真？

translation.en: These things are killers.
translation.zh: 这些东西杀人不眨眼

translation.en: They killed Jarrar, and they killed your parents!
translation.zh: 它们害死了加拉尔还害死了你父母！

translation.en: [gasps] They killed your parents dead.
translation.zh: 它们杀死了你父母

translation.en: Not all of them are beasts.
translation.zh: 不是所有恐龙都是畜生

translation.en: But maybe some of us are!
translation.zh: 但或许我们中的一些人是！

translation.en: Vivian, what are you doing? Come here! Get back here now! Shit.
translation.zh: 薇薇安 你要做什么？回来！快回到这里！该死

translation.en: You're gonna wind up dead, like your momma!
translation.zh: 你会命丧黄泉 和你妈妈一样！

translation.en: -[growls] -Come here, little guy.
translation.zh: 过来 小家伙

translation.en: He's just hungry.
translation.zh: 它只是饿了而已

translation.en: It's like she's dino psychic.
translation.zh: 她好像能跟恐龙进行心灵沟通

translation.en: You're safe now. No one's gonna hurt you.
translation.zh: 你现在很安全 没人会伤害你

translation.en: If that thing moves, I'm gonna blow its fucking head off.
translation.zh: 如果那玩意敢动一下我就把它的脑袋崩掉

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: -Okay. -[baby cliff beast squeals]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [whispering] He's learning
translation.zh: 它在跟她

translation.en: from her.
translation.zh: 学习

translation.en: Okay, let's see if you can do these steps.
translation.zh: 好吧 看看你会不会这样跳

translation.en: Very good. Very good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: Looks like we're about to have us a hoedown.
translation.zh: 看来我们要来一场乡村舞会了

translation.en: [chuckles] All right, here we go.
translation.zh: 好吧 跳起来吧

translation.en: [in ambiguous accent] Now I know
translation.zh: 现在我明白了

translation.en: I must kill them all.
translation.zh: 我必须把它们赶尽杀绝

translation.en: [Darren] And cut!
translation.zh: 卡！

translation.en: Really nice work.
translation.zh: 真的很棒

translation.en: Can you stop? You don't need to do that anymore.
translation.zh: 你能停下吗？不用再放水了

translation.en: Hey, you looked amazing!
translation.zh: 嘿 你刚才表现真棒！

translation.en: Darren, this is such bullshit.
translation.zh: 达伦 这真是太扯淡了

translation.en: That was supposed to be my big scene, and now all I do is piss myself.
translation.zh: 这本来该是我的大场面现在我却只能尿裤子

translation.en: Urination is a very real and human reaction
translation.zh: 排尿是非常真实的这是人类受到悬崖野兽

translation.en: to getting roared at by a cliff beast.
translation.zh: 惊吓后的正常反应

translation.en: -It's humiliating! -I wouldn't worry about it.
translation.zh: -太侮辱人了！-换作是我就不会发愁

translation.en: We've got to serve the Cliff Beast nerds, the fans out there.
translation.zh: 我们要为《悬崖野兽》的脑残粉服务！

translation.en: They want authenticity.
translation.zh: 他们想要真实性

translation.en: Krystal just did a fucking TikTok with a dinosaur. Is that authentic?
translation.zh: 克丽丝托刚才跟恐龙跳抖音舞这也叫真实吗？

translation.en: That dance is the clip they're gonna use in the Oscars.
translation.zh: 那支舞是他们要在奥斯卡上用的片段剪辑

translation.en: -What? No, they're not. -Oh, believe me.
translation.zh: 什么？不 才不是 相信我

translation.en: Gavin, we gotta shut down, buckle down, focus, and I will rewrite that script.
translation.zh: 加文 我们要停止拍摄下定决心 专心致志 我会重写剧本

translation.en: You give me two weeks, and I'll have it rocking.
translation.zh: 你给我两周时间我会让这个剧本大放异彩

translation.en: [Gavin] Shut down for two weeks?
translation.zh: -我们要停拍两周吗？-对 就像《现代启示录》一样

translation.en: Yeah, like they did with Apocalypse Now. That's the model.
translation.zh: -我们要停拍两周吗？-对 就像《现代启示录》一样 他们树立了榜样

translation.en: -What? -We are not shutting down for two weeks.
translation.zh: -干吗？-我们不能停拍两周

translation.en: We told Rafi we'd be gone for three months.
translation.zh: 我们当初跟拉斐说只离开三个月

translation.en: It's been five and a half!
translation.zh: 这都五个半月了！

translation.en: I didn't come all this way to not have it work out.
translation.zh: 我费了这么大劲 不能白费心血

translation.en: Rafi will understand when he sees how great the movie is.
translation.zh: 等拉斐看到这电影有多精彩后他会理解的

translation.en: None of these movies are great.
translation.zh: 这一系列电影全是烂片

translation.en: Hey, I am modeling for him the value of hard work
translation.zh: 嘿 我是在给他做榜样 证明辛勤工作

translation.en: and perseverance and responsibility.
translation.zh: 毅力和责任的价值

translation.en: That is the best thing a father can do for a child.
translation.zh: 这是父亲能给孩子最好的爱

translation.en: No, the best thing a parent can do is be present.
translation.zh: 不对 父母能给孩子最好的爱就是陪伴

translation.en: I told you, my dad took him out to lunch at Nobu, and he seemed fine.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过 我爸带他去松久信幸吃午饭了 他看起来没事

translation.en: -You think he's fine? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你觉得他没事吗？-对

translation.en: He started a GoFundMe for a kidney transplant!
translation.zh: 他为一个肾脏移植病人创建了公开筹款！

translation.en: How much did he raise? $79,000!
translation.zh: -他筹到了多少钱？-79000美元！

translation.en: Kid's an entrepreneur.
translation.zh: 这孩子是个企业家

translation.en: He's only been a part of our family for 17 months!
translation.zh: 他才成为我们的家人17个月！

translation.en: I hate to say this,
translation.zh: 我很讨厌这样说

translation.en: but this franchise has been in my life a lot longer than Rafi has.
translation.zh: 但这个系列在我生命中的时间比拉斐长得多

translation.en: You are so screwed up.
translation.zh: 你真是个烂人

translation.en: I'm gonna make sure that you get put on some no-adoption list!
translation.zh: 我要把你弄上禁止收养名单！

translation.en: -Please, will you do that? -You'll never adopt again!
translation.zh: -你会这样做吗？-你永远都别想领养孩子了！

translation.en: Oh, yeah? I'll adopt again.
translation.zh: 是吗？我会再次领养

translation.en: I'll adopt half of South America if I want!
translation.zh: 如果我想可以领养半个南美洲的孩子！

translation.en: You know, Peru, Chile, Venezuela. Come on, you're living with me!
translation.zh: 秘鲁、智利、委内瑞拉来吧 和我一起生活！

translation.en: [Carol] What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: I'm packing.
translation.zh: 收拾打包

translation.en: You're leaving?
translation.zh: 你要离开吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, tomorrow we have a game. -Oh.
translation.zh: 对 明天我们有个比赛

translation.en: -Didn't I tell you? -No.
translation.zh: -我没告诉你吗？-没有

translation.en: So what do we do now? I mean, can I get your email?
translation.zh: 那我们现在怎么办？你能告诉我你的邮箱吗？

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然可以

translation.en: Okay, what is it?
translation.zh: 好吧 是什么？

translation.en: -Oh, you want it now? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 你现在就要？

translation.en: Oh, but I'm packing.
translation.zh: 但我在收拾行李

translation.en: Okay, what is going on?
translation.zh: 好吧 怎么回事？

translation.en: -What? -[Carol] I'm a bit confused.
translation.zh: -什么？-我有点糊涂

translation.en: I thought we had something serious.
translation.zh: 我还以为我们是认真相处

translation.en: Here's the thing. I'm married.
translation.zh: 是这样的 我结婚了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I have five kids.
translation.zh: 我有五个孩子

translation.en: -You have five kids? -With three different women.
translation.zh: -你有五个孩子？-分别和三个女人生的

translation.en: -With three different women? -I have three more coming.
translation.zh: -分别和三个女人生的？-还有三个快出生了

translation.en: With two other women.
translation.zh: 和其他两个女人的

translation.en: Wow. Okay, so,
translation.zh: 哇 好的 所以…

translation.en: maybe I should call your wife.
translation.zh: 或许我应该给你妻子打电话

translation.en: Really? You'd do that?
translation.zh: 真的吗？你会这样做吗？

translation.en: Yes, you better believe it.
translation.zh: 对 你最好相信

translation.en: Oh, she will love it! She's a huge fan of yours.
translation.zh: 她会开心死！她是你的铁杆粉丝

translation.en: Okay, I'm sorry, I just… I don't know what's happening.
translation.zh: 好吧 很抱歉 我…我不知道这是怎么回事

translation.en: We have a very European relationship with my wife.
translation.zh: 我和妻子的关系非常欧式

translation.en: Okay, what does that mean?
translation.zh: 好吧 这是什么意思？

translation.en: That I'm allowed to have sex with you.
translation.zh: 她允许我和你发生性关系

translation.en: Oh, wow.
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: Okay, this is… What?
translation.zh: 好吧 这真是…什么？

translation.en: No, don't be sad.
translation.zh: 不 不要难过

translation.en: You had fun.
translation.zh: 你也很开心啊！

translation.en: Now, I meant to ask you,
translation.zh: 我应该问你的

translation.en: do you have PayPal?
translation.zh: 你有贝宝吗？

translation.en: Yes?
translation.zh: 有又怎样？

translation.en: Because that KitKat and that water you had last night?
translation.zh: 记得昨晚你吃的奇巧和喝的那瓶水吗？

translation.en: It cost £26.
translation.zh: 价值26欧元

translation.en: Anika…
translation.zh: 安妮卡…你值夜班吗？

translation.en: -You're working the night shift? -Yes, I do.
translation.zh: 安妮卡…你值夜班吗？ 对 没错

translation.en: I see the way you look at me.
translation.zh: 我明白你看我的眼神

translation.en: Yeah, I feel the same way, and I want you to know
translation.zh: 对 我有着同样的感觉 我希望你知道

translation.en: I wanna rip your clothes off and have my way with you like an animal.
translation.zh: 我想把你的衣服撕下来像动物那样跟你做那种事

translation.en: -That's amazing. -Yeah, it is.
translation.zh: -太好了-没错

translation.en: -But-- -Hi.
translation.zh: -但是…-嗨

translation.en: Where are you guys going?
translation.zh: 你们要去哪？

translation.en: Um… To help him plunge his toilet.
translation.zh: 帮他通马桶

translation.en: I'll do it. I'll plunge his toilet.
translation.zh: 交给我吧 我帮他通马桶

translation.en: Let me handle his toilet.
translation.zh: 还是我来吧

translation.en: I would plunge the hell out of your toilet.
translation.zh: 我会把他的马桶彻底通好

translation.en: I would. Let me plunge your toilet.
translation.zh: 我会的 让我通开你的马桶

translation.en: I want to plunge this toilet!
translation.zh: 我想通这马桶！

translation.en: I'm only trying to take care of you,
translation.zh: 我只是想照顾你

translation.en: so you don't find yourself in the wrong toilet.
translation.zh: 这样你就不会发现自己通错马桶了

translation.en: You're not in charge of which toilet I should plunge!
translation.zh: 你管不着我应该通哪个马桶！

translation.en: I'm just doing what's right for you and his toilet, which I will now plunge.
translation.zh: 我这样做都是为了你和他的马桶我现在就去给他通

translation.en: I will handle this toilet. I'm gonna clean your toilet.
translation.zh: 这个马桶就交给我我会清理好你的马桶

translation.en: Sir, let's go. Thank you, Anika.
translation.zh: 先生 我们走 谢谢你 安妮卡

translation.en: Where are you?
translation.zh: 你在哪？

translation.en: [Josh] I'm in our bed.
translation.zh: 我们的床上

translation.en: It's so cozy and warm. Feels like home.
translation.zh: 非常温暖舒适 很有家的感觉

translation.en: I can't wait till this movie's over. I miss being there with you sometimes.
translation.zh: 我等不及电影拍完了有时我想念和你在一起的日子

translation.en: I'm sorry this has been so hard.
translation.zh: 很抱歉离别这么艰难

translation.en: Hey, what's going on?
translation.zh: 嘿 怎么了？

translation.en: [sighs] Carol's still not over it.
translation.zh: 卡罗尔还放不下

translation.en: -Oh, poor girl. -Yeah, she's really struggling right now.
translation.zh: -可怜的姑娘-对 她现在还是很痛苦

translation.en: What? You can't just live in my house with your new girlfriend!
translation.zh: 什么？你不能和你的新女友住在我家！

translation.en: Hey, I'm house-sitting for you for free! Pump the brakes, Carol!
translation.zh: 嘿 我可是在免费为你看家！你生什么气 卡罗尔！

translation.en: -Hey, what do you want from Postmates? -We did Chinese last night, right?
translation.zh: -嘿 你想点什么外卖？-我们昨晚点了中餐 对吧？

translation.en: -I could do Thai? -I could do Thai.
translation.zh: -可以点泰餐吗？-我可以吃泰餐

translation.en: Do not Postmates to my house! I'm coming home right now!
translation.zh: 不要在我家点外卖！我现在就回家！

translation.en: -What the fuck are you doing? -I'm locking the script.
translation.zh: -你在做什么？-我要封锁剧本

translation.en: You won't be needing these anymore. You know why? Because you're done!
translation.zh: 你不再需要这些东西了知道为什么吗？因为你完了！

translation.en: Back away!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: -Eddie Vedder gave me that guitar! -I don't care!
translation.zh: -这吉他是艾迪维达送我的！-我不在乎！

translation.en: -That doesn't bother me. -Oh, no?
translation.zh: -我才不会生气-是吗？

translation.en: My work is in the cloud.
translation.zh: 我的作品上传云端了

translation.en: Are you sure, SummerBoy1987? [manic laugh]
translation.zh: 你确定吗 夏日男孩1987？

translation.en: That's my cloud!
translation.zh: 那是我的云端！

translation.en: -It's not anymore! -[line ringing]
translation.zh: 不再是了！

translation.en: Rafi, look in the camera!
translation.zh: 拉斐 看着镜头！

translation.en: Look at Daddy's computer.
translation.zh: 看着爸爸的电脑

translation.en: Mommy lit it on fire because Daddy's script is in the computer!
translation.zh: 妈妈把它点着了因为爸爸的剧本都在电脑里！

translation.en: Daddy's trying to make a movie that's not a piece of shit,
translation.zh: 爸爸是不想再拍烂片了

translation.en: like Mommy likes to make.
translation.zh: 但妈妈就喜欢拍烂片

translation.en: Your mom's a hack, Rafi!
translation.zh: 你妈妈是黑客 拉斐！

translation.en: I don't care.
translation.zh: 我不在乎

translation.en: I don't like movies. They're too long! Bye.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢电影 太长了！再见

translation.en: Well, this hack is gonna go home and take care of our little angel.
translation.zh: 本黑客要回家照顾我们的小天使了

translation.en: He's no angel.
translation.zh: 他不是天使

translation.en: You think the cat drowned itself?
translation.zh: 你觉得猫是自己淹死的吗？

translation.en: Just so you know, I know that this thing is never gonna happen again!
translation.zh: 你要知道 我知道这种事永远不会再发生了！

translation.en: Rafi! Momma's coming home!
translation.zh: 拉斐！妈妈要回家了！

translation.en: [Lauren] Freedom!
translation.zh: 自由！

translation.en: [screams] Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: [Best] That's wonderful work.
translation.zh: 你枪法真好

translation.en: That's my tennis hand, you motherfucker!
translation.zh: 我用这只手打网球 你这王八蛋！

translation.en: [gasps in fright] Gavin!
translation.zh: 加文！

translation.en: -He got my fingers! -You trying to escape too?
translation.zh: -他打掉了我的手指！-你也想逃跑吗？

translation.en: Of course not. I just heard a commotion.
translation.zh: 当然不了 我只是听到了骚动

translation.en: Calm down. [grunts]
translation.zh: 冷静

translation.en: -[loud gasp] -What the hell's going on?
translation.zh: 这到底怎么回事？

translation.en: -What are you doing? Why did you hit him? -[screaming]
translation.zh: 你这是干吗？为什么要打他？

translation.en: -Oh, what did you do to your hand? -You did this!
translation.zh: -你对自己的手做了什么？-明明要怪你！

translation.en: I will sort this. Go back inside.
translation.zh: 我会解决好 你快回去

translation.en: -Did you fall in the gravel? -No! This is all your fault!
translation.zh: -你摔在碎石上了吗？-不！这都是你的错！

translation.en: The therapist said not to blame. Don't blame me!
translation.zh: 心理医生说不要责怪别人 别怪我！

translation.en: What the hell is going on here?
translation.zh: 这里怎么回事？

translation.en: The security guards, they got confused.
translation.zh: 安全守卫一时糊涂

translation.en: They thought that Lauren was a deranged fan, and they shot her,
translation.zh: 他们还以为劳伦是狂热的粉丝所以开枪打了她

translation.en: and she lost a few fingers.
translation.zh: 她被打掉几根手指

translation.en: She'll be fine. Just a few digits.
translation.zh: 她不会有事 几根手指而已

translation.en: Just a graze.
translation.zh: 擦伤而已

translation.en: Nothing to worry about.
translation.zh: 没什么好担心的

translation.en: Gavin, you can't shoot the actors.
translation.zh: 加文 你不能开枪打演员

translation.en: You can't even poison the fuckers these days. The press always finds out.
translation.zh: 现在连毒死那些混蛋都不行媒体总会发现的

translation.en: It wasn't my call to shoot them. Mr. Best reports to you.
translation.zh: 向他们开枪不是我的决定你是贝斯特先生的上司

translation.en: -Mr. Best? Sorry, who's Mr. Best? -[elephant trumpets on screen]
translation.zh: 贝斯特先生？抱歉 这人是谁？

translation.en: I thought you sent him.
translation.zh: 我还以为他是你派来的

translation.en: Mr. Best? I don't… That does not ring a bell.
translation.zh: 贝斯特先生？我不…我一点印象都没有

translation.en: Sounds scary. Sounds like someone you wouldn't wanna fuck with.
translation.zh: 听上去很可怕 听上去像一个让人“性趣”全无的人

translation.en: Someone who'd do anything to make sure the movie got made.
translation.zh: 一个会用尽一切手段确保电影完成的人

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: We need to shut down.
translation.zh: 我们需要停拍

translation.en: -We're not shutting the movie down. -We are shutting down the movie.
translation.zh: -我们不能停拍电影-我们要停拍电影

translation.en: -We are not shutting down the movie. -[yells] We are shutting down the movie!
translation.zh: -我们不能停拍电影-我们要停拍电影 宝拉！

translation.en: It's not like the world is desperate for another Cliff Beasts movie!
translation.zh: 没了下一部《悬崖野兽》地球又不是不转了！

translation.en: This isn't a vaccine!
translation.zh: 它不是疫苗！

translation.en: This is a Cliff Beasts movie. There's five of them.
translation.zh: 只是一部《悬崖野兽》电影而已已经有五部了

translation.en: They're all the same!
translation.zh: 它们都是一路货！

translation.en: Sorry, I was frozen there for a second,
translation.zh: 抱歉 刚才卡了一下

translation.en: but I assume you were agreeing with everything I was saying,
translation.zh: 但我认为你同意我说的每一点

translation.en: and I'm so glad because if you don't get the movie in the can,
translation.zh: 我很高兴 因为如果电影不拍完

translation.en: I'll send one of these fucking elephants to trample your house and your children.
translation.zh: 我就会派其中一头大象踩烂你的房子和孩子

translation.en: Okay? Hakuna matata, my sweet. [kisses]
translation.zh: 好吗？哈库纳马塔塔 亲爱的

translation.en: -[line disconnects] -Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: I so wanna be her.
translation.zh: 我真想成为她这样的人

translation.en: Hi, Tom.
translation.zh: 嗨 汤姆

translation.en: I hate to tell you this,
translation.zh: 我很不想告诉你这件事

translation.en: but I don't think we have enough time or money to finish this Cliff Beasts--
translation.zh: 但我觉得我们没有足够的时间还有资金完成这部《悬崖野兽》…

translation.en: Great, then just get it done and we'll be in touch.
translation.zh: 没问题 赶紧拍好 保持联系

translation.en: I don't think it's possible to get it done.
translation.zh: 我觉得不可能拍完了

translation.en: Don't make an enemy of me, Paula. I will destroy you from within!
translation.zh: 别跟我作对 宝拉我会摧毁你的内心防线！

translation.en: Okay, Tom. Thank you for this opportunity.
translation.zh: 好的 汤姆 谢谢你给我这次机会

translation.en: -Hello? -[Tom] Li.
translation.zh: -你好？-李

translation.en: The schedule's impossible with the budget we have.
translation.zh: （李 执行董事长）

translation.en: Great. Then get it done and we will be in touch.
translation.zh: 没问题 赶紧拍好 我们保持联系

translation.en: No, Li, you don't understand. This is impossible.
translation.zh: 不 李 你不理解 这不可能

translation.en: I have faith in you. You have never let me down before.
translation.zh: 我对你有信心 你从未让我失望过

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: Are you in Fiji?
translation.zh: 你在斐济吗？

translation.en: -Yes, I'm in Fiji. -I'm down the beach!
translation.zh: -对 我在斐济-我在海滩上！

translation.en: I have not seen anyone in 37 days!
translation.zh: 我都37天没见到人影了！

translation.en: -You want to play tennis? -I would love to play tennis!
translation.zh: -你想打网球吗？-我太想跟你打网球了！

translation.en: -Four o'clock? -Four o'clock!
translation.zh: -四点钟？-四点钟！

translation.en: Do you have balls? Oh, I have balls! [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你有球吗？噢 我有球！

translation.en: I spoke to Lauren this morning.
translation.zh: 我今天早上跟劳伦谈过了

translation.en: She loves you all, and she said the best thing that you could do for her
translation.zh: 她爱你们所有人她说你们能给她最大的慰藉

translation.en: would be to make this movie great.
translation.zh: 就是把这部电影拍成巨作

translation.en: I spoke to her too, and she is not being cool about it.
translation.zh: 我也跟她谈了 她意见很大

translation.en: She's really pissed at me like it's my fault.
translation.zh: 她非常生我的气 好像是我的错一样

translation.en: I didn't shoot her fingers off.
translation.zh: 但我没有把她的手指崩掉

translation.en: Mr. Best's team thought that you were being attacked by a crazed stalker.
translation.zh: 贝斯特先生的团队误以为你们被一个疯狂的跟踪者袭击

translation.en: Were they able to reattach her fingers?
translation.zh: 他们能把她的手指接回去吗？

translation.en: -They, uh, didn't find any of them. -[Darren gasps]
translation.zh: 他们一根手指都没找到

translation.en: -All that's left is a thumb. -This is a blessing.
translation.zh: -只剩下一根拇指了-这是一种恩赐 好吗？

translation.en: Lauren is gonna come back from this stronger.
translation.zh: 劳伦经历过这次劫难后 会更加强大

translation.en: There are a million things you can do with a thumb. It's not like it's a pinkie.
translation.zh: 用大拇指能做很多很多事小拇指就不是这样

translation.en: When will she shoot the rest of her scenes?
translation.zh: 她什么时候拍剩下的戏？

translation.en: Well, we're not gonna shoot the rest of her scenes. Lauren is wrapped.
translation.zh: 她剩下的戏就不拍了 劳伦杀青了

translation.en: We've got some clever fixes I don't think anybody's gonna notice.
translation.zh: 我们有一些聪明的修复方法观众应该看不出来

translation.en: So are we allowed to leave?
translation.zh: 所以我们可以离开了吗？

translation.en: We can't do that, unfortunately. You have to stay 'cause we have contracts.
translation.zh: 很抱歉 我们不能放你们走你们必须留下来 因为我们签合同了

translation.en: It's called being an adult.
translation.zh: 这叫成年人的义务

translation.en: Fucking Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 老天爷

translation.en: [Gavin] Uh, one hiccup. Shouldn't be too much of a problem.
translation.zh: 好吧 现在有个小困难但应该不会有什么影响

translation.en: Our stunt coordinator, Steve, has had a bit of a virus scare,
translation.zh: 我们的特技协调员史蒂夫对病毒有些恐慌

translation.en: so he is going to be joining us on Zoom today.
translation.zh: 所以今天他会以视频会议的方式陪我们拍摄

translation.en: -Oh, it takes so long to shoot action. -Steve!
translation.zh: -拍动作场景要花很长时间-史蒂夫！

translation.en: Hey, guys! Hope everybody's excited for today's stunt sequence.
translation.zh: 嘿 大家好！希望今天的特技镜头让大家热情高涨

translation.en: Uh, Steve, looks like you lost some weight. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 史蒂夫 你好像瘦了点

translation.en: I'm the same weight as always.
translation.zh: 我的体重一如往常

translation.en: All right, uh, let's go through the scene.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们来讲一下戏

translation.en: Okay, you know what? Let's run it. Just as we rehearsed, it's gonna be…
translation.zh: 好的 开始吧 就像排练的那样 就是…

translation.en: [voice breaking] I froze. I'm frozen. Did I freeze?
translation.zh: 我卡住了 我卡住了 我刚才卡住了吗？

translation.en: Fucking bullshit! I told you it wouldn't work!
translation.zh: 该死！我跟你说了行不通的！

translation.en: [voice breaking] Am I clear now? Am I coming in clear?
translation.zh: 都清楚了吗？我都说清楚了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Go ahead.
translation.zh: -是的-史蒂夫 继续

translation.en: Here's how it goes. The action starts when Dustin engages the first iceman.
translation.zh: 是这样的 动作戏从达斯汀制服第一个冰人开始

translation.en: Typical hand-to-hand combat. Remember, parry, jab, end up with a naked choke.
translation.zh: 经典的肉搏战 记住格挡闪避、刺拳 然后以裸绞结束

translation.en: Okay, take me over to the mound.
translation.zh: 好的 带我去土堆那边

translation.en: On the mound, Carol's gonna take out icemen four and five
translation.zh: 在土堆上 卡罗尔会丢几颗炸弹

translation.en: with a series of explosions.
translation.zh: 干掉四号和五号冰人

translation.en: Dieter and Krystal, you're providing cover fire for the icemen,
translation.zh: 迪特尔和克丽丝托你们提供对战冰人的火力掩护

translation.en: [voice breaking] and, Sean, you're gonna walk--
translation.zh: 肖恩 你要走…

translation.en: Question. When I'm supposed to get to my mark, do I turn to my left?
translation.zh: 问题 我该怎么到达我的位置我要向左转吗？

translation.en: Okay, first team, walking on! Let's do this!
translation.zh: 好的 第一组 动起来！开拍吧！

translation.en: Watch out! Watch out!
translation.zh: 小心！

translation.en: [chuckles] I'd see that movie!
translation.zh: 我一定会看这部电影！

translation.en: I forgot to tell you that my dad sucks at stunts.
translation.zh: 我忘记跟你说了 我爸做特技很烂

translation.en: Sorry, think I grabbed the wrong wire. Let's do another one-- No!
translation.zh: 抱歉 我好像抓错绳子了我们趁现在再拍…不！

translation.en: [man] Bloody hell.
translation.zh: 见鬼了

translation.en: I was checking my email real quick. How'd it go?
translation.zh: 我刚才看了一下邮件 拍得如何？

translation.en: Um… Not very well. We might have to…
translation.zh: 不是很好 我们可能得…

translation.en: -Do another take, yeah. -[Sean groaning]
translation.zh: 再拍一条 好的

translation.en: I want you to call the studio and tell them to fuck off!
translation.zh: 我要你给电影公司打电话让他们滚蛋！

translation.en: Well, what happens then when I need to get a bigger trailer for Mark Ruffalo,
translation.zh: 那以后我要是想给马克鲁弗洛争取到长点的预告片该怎么办？

translation.en: I ask 'em and they say, "You just told us to fuck off for Carol"?
translation.zh: 如果我找他们 他们会说：“你之前替卡罗尔出气 让我们滚蛋”

translation.en: -I can't do that, okay? -Do I have a hard out date on my contract?
translation.zh: -我做不到 好吗？-我的合同上有硬性结束日期吗？

translation.en: -No. -So they could just make me work forever.
translation.zh: -没有-那他们就可以永远剥削我

translation.en: No, not forever. They're not monsters! They're just trying to make a good movie.
translation.zh: 不 不是永远 他们不是怪物！他们只是想拍一部好电影

translation.en: We're being mistreated!
translation.zh: 他们这是欺负我们！

translation.en: Oh, spare me! You're being "actress-mistreated."
translation.zh: 放过我吧！你是以女演员的身份受欺负

translation.en: I'm being fucking human being-mistreated!
translation.zh: 而我是以一个活生生的人受欺负！

translation.en: You ever try to teach a 12-year-old math? It's impossible, okay?
translation.zh: 你有没有试过教12岁的孩子数学？难于上青天 好吗？

translation.en: He's been shut up in his room.
translation.zh: 他被关在房间里

translation.en: I walked in there the other day, and he was watching Japanese taxi porn.
translation.zh: 有一天我走进去他正在看日本出租车黄片

translation.en: What is Japanese taxi porn?
translation.zh: 什么是日本出租车黄片？

translation.en: Just what it sounds like.
translation.zh: 顾名思义嘛

translation.en: They fuck the taxi driver halfway through the video, in Japan!
translation.zh: 在日本 视频播到一半出租车司机就会被操！

translation.en: I need you to call the studio and tell them to stop mistreating us.
translation.zh: 我需要你给电影公司打电话告诉他们别再欺负我们

translation.en: Otherwise, I'm out. I'm walking.
translation.zh: 否则我就退出 离开这里

translation.en: You walk off the film now,
translation.zh: 如果你现在退出电影拍摄

translation.en: you are financially responsible for any overages that you create.
translation.zh: 就要为自己造成的所有超支负经济责任

translation.en: What? What does that mean?
translation.zh: 什么？这什么意思？

translation.en: It means that if you leave the movie, you will owe them 114 million bucks.
translation.zh: 意思就是 如果你退出电影就会欠他们1.14亿美元

translation.en: I didn't know that was in there!
translation.zh: 我都不知道这回事！

translation.en: I didn't either. I didn't read your contract!
translation.zh: 我也不知道 我没读你的合同！

translation.en: You're not being a good agent or a good friend.
translation.zh: 你不是称职的经纪人也不是称职的朋友

translation.en: I'm being a very good agent. And you know what? I'm not your friend.
translation.zh: 我是一个很称职的经纪人还有 你知道吗？我不是你的朋友

translation.en: It's something we pretend when there isn't a pandemic.
translation.zh: 那是我们在疫情没爆发时维持的假象

translation.en: -I gotta go. It's Mark Ruffalo. -Don't hang up--
translation.zh: -我要挂了 是马克鲁弗洛-别挂…

translation.en: Hey, Mark.
translation.zh: 嘿 马克

translation.en: Oh, my God, you're in the pool.
translation.zh: 天啊 你在泳池里

translation.en: How you doing?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: I thought today was so good.
translation.zh: 我觉得今天很美好

translation.en: You did?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: -Did you not? -No! Today was a disaster.
translation.zh: -你不觉得吗？-不！今天就是场灾难

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -Everyone got injured in the stunt!
translation.zh: -你在说什么？-所有人都在拍特技时受伤了！

translation.en: I mean before the stunt. The scene that we did before was incredible.
translation.zh: 我说的是特技之前我们之前拍的那场戏非常精彩

translation.en: That was genius, but everybody got really hurt.
translation.zh: 对 那场戏确实很有才但今天大家都伤得不轻

translation.en: Yeah, that was unfortunate for sure. I'm gonna talk to them tomorrow.
translation.zh: 对 这当然很不幸我明天会跟大家谈谈

translation.en: I just… Honestly, I don't think I have anything left to give.
translation.zh: 我只是…说实话我觉得自己筋疲力竭了

translation.en: I'm so sorry about that.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: I guess I was so focused on the dinosaurs, I forgot there are human beings involved.
translation.zh: 大概是我太过关注恐龙而忘记这部电影里也有人类了

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 对啊

translation.en: Yeah. I'm gonna talk to Gavin. I'm gonna really change things so that you're happy.
translation.zh: 好 我会跟加文谈谈我真的会做出改变 让你们满意

translation.en: I am mortified.
translation.zh: 我感到非常抱歉

translation.en: Really? That would be a lifesaver!
translation.zh: 真的吗？真是及时雨！

translation.en: Carol, I'm really sorry.
translation.zh: 卡罗尔 我真的很抱歉

translation.en: [Darren] I'm gonna fix this.
translation.zh: 我会解决的

translation.en: -Hey. -Oh, my God!
translation.zh: -嘿-天啊！

translation.en: -I'll race you. Come on! -Hey!
translation.zh: -我们来比赛 快点！-嘿！

translation.en: Come on. Try and catch me! [laughing]
translation.zh: 来吧 快来抓我！

translation.en: Marco!
translation.zh: 马可！

translation.en: Hey, Darren. What's up here?
translation.zh: 嘿 达伦 这怎么回事？

translation.en: These are not my pages.
translation.zh: 这些不是我写的剧本

translation.en: Yeah, um, we decided we're just… We're not gonna shoot those.
translation.zh: 我们决定…我们不拍那些戏了

translation.en: They weren't good, so we're gonna go and shoot the original script,
translation.zh: 写得不太好 所以我们要拍原始剧本

translation.en: also known as the real script that was approved by the studio.
translation.zh: 也就是电影公司批准的真正剧本

translation.en: Also known as the worst fucking draft!
translation.zh: 同时也是最糟糕的一稿！

translation.en: Everybody agrees that my revisions are kicking ass.
translation.zh: 大家都赞同我的修改非常完美

translation.en: They clarify our pro-environmental message.
translation.zh: 这些修改阐明了我们支持环保的意图

translation.en: People don't care about the environment.
translation.zh: 大家不在乎环境

translation.en: People go to see the movies to see dinosaurs blow up and die.
translation.zh: 这电影的看点是恐龙被炸死

translation.en: Why? Because dinosaurs kill people. They're monsters!
translation.zh: 为什么？因为恐龙会杀死人它们是怪物！

translation.en: We need a movie with heart. [hesitates] Ask Martha. Martha?
translation.zh: 我们需要一部有感情的电影你问问玛莎 玛莎？

translation.en: She's our audience.
translation.zh: 她是我们的观众

translation.en: Don't the dinosaurs need to live?
translation.zh: 难道恐龙不需要活下去吗？

translation.en: I don't care if dinosaurs die, you know? I thought they were dead.
translation.zh: 我才不在乎恐龙死不死 知道吗？它们不是早就死了吗？

translation.en: Fine. I'll do your shit word-for-word.
translation.zh: 好吧 我会一字一句按你的破剧本来

translation.en: That fucking scene we're about to shoot,
translation.zh: 接下来要拍的那场烂戏

translation.en: I don't know how I'll make it work, but I will 'cause that's what I do.
translation.zh: 我不知道自己如何能拍好但我会的 因为这是我的专长

translation.en: I turn shit into gold.
translation.zh: 我能把垃圾变成金子

translation.en: [Gunther] You're meant to slurp those ones back.
translation.zh: 你应该把这些吃了

translation.en: Hey, do you know, I heard that the movie is going really badly.
translation.zh: 嘿 你们知道吗？我听说这电影拍摄很不顺

translation.en: They're gonna extend for another three months. I can't be happier! [laughs]
translation.zh: 他们会多拍三个月我真是太高兴了！

translation.en: The longer these shitbags stay in my hotel,
translation.zh: 这些废物在我的酒店待的时间越长

translation.en: the bigger my house is gonna be when they leave.
translation.zh: 他们离开后 我的房子就会越大

translation.en: I'm gonna have one of those toilets that shoots water up my ass,
translation.zh: 我要买个能给屁股喷水的马桶

translation.en: heats it and dries it for me.
translation.zh: 带加热和烘干功能的

translation.en: -Ronjon is not touching anything anymore. -[others cheering]
translation.zh: 荣乔不要再碰任何东西了

translation.en: Plus, the more we stay here,
translation.zh: 而且 我们在这里待得越久

translation.en: the more Dieter will realize that he doesn't need anything but me.
translation.zh: 迪特尔就会越来越明白他只需要我

translation.en: -Ooh! -[Anika] Yes.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: -Cheers! Never stop filming! -[Gunther] Never stop filming! Never stop filming!
translation.zh: -干杯！永远不停拍！-永远不停拍！

translation.en: [all] ♪ Go, Cliff Beasts It's your birthday ♪ ♪ Go, Cliff Beasts It's your birthday ♪
translation.zh: 加油 悬崖野兽 今天你过生日

translation.en: -♪ Hey! ♪ -♪ Go, Cliff Beasts, it's your birthday ♪
translation.zh: -嘿！-加油 悬崖野兽 今天你过生日

translation.en: -♪ Go, Cliff Beasts, it's your birthday ♪ -[Ronjon] ♪ Part one, part two ♪
translation.zh: -加油 悬崖野兽 今天你过生日-第一部分 -加油 悬崖野兽 今天你过生日-第二部分

translation.en: [Dustin] I'm here.
translation.zh: 我来了

translation.en: We're a family.
translation.zh: 我们是一家人

translation.en: You've always been my hero.
translation.zh: 你一直都是我的英雄

translation.en: I know that our love will get us through this nightmare.
translation.zh: 我知道我们的爱会带领我们走出这场噩梦

translation.en: And cut!
translation.zh: 卡！

translation.en: -[bell ringing] -[Darren] Moving on. Excellent.
translation.zh: 结束 很好

translation.en: Great. That was… I really felt that. That was powerful.
translation.zh: 太棒了 刚才…我感受到了很强烈的情感

translation.en: -Did I capture her physicality? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 对她的模仿 我做到形似了吧？

translation.en: Yeah, you're fine. It's just you're six inches too tall.
translation.zh: 你还不错 只是你比她高15公分

translation.en: -And you're not my wife. -Okay.
translation.zh: -而且你不是我老婆-好吧

translation.en: -She got her hand blown off, my wife. -I didn't…
translation.zh: 我老婆的手被炸掉了

translation.en: I didn't even go back to help her rehab. I had to finish this fucking movie.
translation.zh: 我当初甚至都没回去帮她戒瘾我得拍完这破电影

translation.en: -What asshole does that? -It's a specific situation--
translation.zh: -什么样的混蛋会做出这种事？-这是个具体…

translation.en: -Am I an asshole? -No.
translation.zh: -我是混蛋吗？-不是

translation.en: -The fuck am I doing? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -那我这是在做什么？-我不知道

translation.en: I lost my wife and my adopted child of two years for this?
translation.zh: 就为了这电影 我失去了老婆和收养了两年的孩子？

translation.en: All this time I was producing this movie, I should have been producing my family!
translation.zh: 制作电影的这段时间我应该好好维系家庭！

translation.en: -Are you a producer? -Uncredited, but everybody knows.
translation.zh: -你是这部电影的制片吗？-我是无名制片 但大家都知道

translation.en: See that?
translation.zh: -看到没有？-他那样反应

translation.en: He's reacting like that because you made him feel something.
translation.zh: -看到没有？-他那样反应 是因为他有感觉 你让他有感觉了

translation.en: -Thank you. -So, well done.
translation.zh: -谢谢-干得漂亮

translation.en: What even was that?
translation.zh: 这叫什么？

translation.en: That is called a "storm off." It's a pretty good one.
translation.zh: 这叫“怒而离席” 还挺经典的

translation.en: Got any good notes for that, Mr. Sundance?
translation.zh: 有什么好建议吗 圣丹斯先生？

translation.en: This is the moment you chose to talk to me?
translation.zh: 你选择现在跟我说话吗？

translation.en: To come in here and heckle me? You?
translation.zh: 来这里质问我吗？就凭你？

translation.en: We've got a saying about people like you in the business.
translation.zh: 业内对你这种人有句老话

translation.en: They talk about you. A sucky fucking worst actor.
translation.zh: 他们会背后议论你一个烂透了的演员

translation.en: You're a sellout. You're ruining everything.
translation.zh: 你是个背叛者 害群之马

translation.en: You're making me look bad.
translation.zh: 你让我面子上挂不住

translation.en: You're a poser!
translation.zh: 你只知道装腔作势！

translation.en: Just kind of talking and mumbling. That's not acting!
translation.zh: 你只是在说话还有嘟囔这不是表演！

translation.en: I'm posing with my Oscar!
translation.zh: 那我也是凭着奥斯卡奖装腔作势！

translation.en: Carol!
translation.zh: 卡罗尔！

translation.en: -Hey! What are you mad about? -I have nothing to do in these scenes.
translation.zh: -嘿！你在生什么气？-这几场戏里没有我的戏份

translation.en: They keep trimming me and punishing me. You were gonna talk to the studio.
translation.zh: 他们一直删减我的戏份 惩罚我你说过会跟电影公司谈的

translation.en: -I did. -And?
translation.zh: -我谈过了-结果呢？

translation.en: It didn't go well. I think it actually backfired.
translation.zh: 不太顺利 反而起到了反作用

translation.en: You're the director! They'll give you whatever you want. They'll listen to you.
translation.zh: 你是导演！他们会对你百依百顺他们会听你的

translation.en: No, they will not!
translation.zh: 不 他们不会！

translation.en: They'll bring in Jon Favreau to finish it and send me home in a body bag.
translation.zh: 他们会请乔恩费儒拍完电影然后把我装在尸袋里送回家

translation.en: I don't want to go to directors jail, okay?
translation.zh: 我不想进导演黑名单 好吗？

translation.en: -Is everything okay? -[Carol] No.
translation.zh: -没事吧？-有事

translation.en: They cut my lines and won't let me leave. Nobody is looking out for me!
translation.zh: 他们删我的台词 还不让我走没有人关照我！

translation.en: That is simply not true, Carol. I am your advocate. I'm your warrior.
translation.zh: 这肯定不是真的 卡罗尔我是你的拥护者 我是你的战士！

translation.en: If you could see how hard I work for you
translation.zh: 如果你能看到我在幕后在紧闭的门后

translation.en: behind the scenes, behind closed doors, on Zoom!
translation.zh: 在视频会议上拼命为你争取就好了！

translation.en: This is bullshit! You make us work when we're sick or injured.
translation.zh: 你在扯淡！我们生病或受伤了你还逼我们拍戏

translation.en: That is not okay!
translation.zh: 不能这样！

translation.en: I'm sorry, if I might interject, I just got a call about your grandma.
translation.zh: 很抱歉 我打断一下我刚刚接了个关于你奶奶的电话

translation.en: -Okay, what? -She died.
translation.zh: -好吧 怎么了？-她去世了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Yeah, she's dead. Um, in her sleep, so…
translation.zh: 对 她去世了 在睡梦中 所以…

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. -[Pippa] I'm sorry as well.
translation.zh: -请节哀-请节哀

translation.en: -[Gavin] I'm so sorry. -Okay.
translation.zh: -请节哀-好

translation.en: Uh, so I think I need to go be with my family right now.
translation.zh: 那我觉得自己现在应该陪着家人

translation.en: That's just not gonna be possible, Carol.
translation.zh: 这不可能 卡罗尔

translation.en: Then make it possible.
translation.zh: 那就把它变成可能

translation.en: You're not the only one suffering loss! My dog got run over.
translation.zh: 你不是唯一饱受丧亲之痛的人！我的狗狗被碾死了

translation.en: Did I burden everybody here with it? No. I grieved alone.
translation.zh: 我给片场的各位带来负担了吗？没有 我独自哀悼！

translation.en: Mmm. I had to abandon my cat on the street just to shoot this movie.
translation.zh: 为了拍这部电影我得丢弃自己的猫 让它流落街头

translation.en: I got a friend going through a really hard time, and I can't be there.
translation.zh: 我有个朋友正在经历非常艰难的时期我都没办法陪他

translation.en: His movie didn't open and he's depressed.
translation.zh: 他的电影没开拍 他很抑郁

translation.en: -How old was your grandma? -She was 97.
translation.zh: -你奶奶高寿？-97岁

translation.en: Well, that's sad, but life has to go on. And the show has to go on.
translation.zh: 真令人难过 但生活必须继续拍摄不能停止！

translation.en: You know what? You have become a monster!
translation.zh: 知道吗？你变成怪物了！

translation.en: -Oh, mask! -[Darren] Oh, shoot!
translation.zh: -口罩！-该死！

translation.en: Yeah, I'm drinking, so…
translation.zh: 我在喝酒 所以…

translation.en: Dustin, don't be sad. The dailies look great!
translation.zh: 达斯汀 别难过 每天的拍摄都不错！

translation.en: Hello, this is Paula from the studio,
translation.zh: 你们好 我是电影公司的宝拉

translation.en: and I just wanted to say thank you all for your tremendous sacrifice.
translation.zh: 我想谢谢大家付出的巨大牺牲

translation.en: It is worth it.
translation.zh: 这是值得的

translation.en: Hey, Paula, who are you talking to?
translation.zh: 嘿 宝拉 你在跟谁说话？

translation.en: Beck! Well, I'm talking to the cast of Cliff Beasts 6!
translation.zh: 贝克！我在跟《悬崖野兽6》的演员说话！

translation.en: No way. Action movie? That's one of my favorite action movie franchises.
translation.zh: 不是吧 动作电影吗？这是我最喜欢的系列动作电影之一

translation.en: Really? Mine too! I hear they have some downtime.
translation.zh: 真的吗？我也是！我听说他们停工了

translation.en: Maybe you wanna play 'em some funky grooves.
translation.zh: 或许你可以给他们演唱几首放克歌曲

translation.en: Playing funky grooves is what I do best. Who's in the mood for a ladies' night?
translation.zh: 我最擅长演唱放克歌曲了谁想来个女士之夜？

translation.en: I know I am. Ladies and gentlemen, Beck.
translation.zh: 我想！女士们 先生们 欢迎贝克

translation.en: How's everybody feeling? You all look so sexy tonight!
translation.zh: 大家感觉如何？你们今晚都很性感！

translation.en: The studio wanted to show their appreciation
translation.zh: 电影公司想表示他们的感谢之情

translation.en: by having me turn this motherfucker out!
translation.zh: 所以请我开嗓点燃这里！

translation.en: Whoo! Thank you for fulfilling your contracts!
translation.zh: 谢谢大家履行合约！

translation.en: ♪ Only 37 more days of shooting And we got this one in the can! ♪
translation.zh: 再有37天的拍摄这部电影就杀青了！

translation.en: Beck! Whoo!
translation.zh: 贝克 不错！

translation.en: Everybody get up out of your seats. Get up out of your seats! Come on!
translation.zh: 大家都站起来 快站起来！

translation.en: ♪ Girls, y'all got the one ♪
translation.zh: 姑娘们 你们都可以享受

translation.en: ♪ A night that's special everywhere ♪
translation.zh: 这个到处都很特别的夜晚

translation.en: ♪ From New York… ♪ ♪ To Hollywood ♪
translation.zh: 从纽约到好莱坞

translation.en: ♪ It's ladies' night And, girl, the feeling's good ♪
translation.zh: 女士之夜 姑娘们都迈开舞步

translation.en: ♪ Oh, yes, it's ladies' night ♪
translation.zh: 没错 今晚是女士之夜

translation.en: ♪ And the feeling's right ♪
translation.zh: 这氛围恰好对味

translation.en: ♪ Oh, yes, it's ladies' night ♪
translation.zh: 没错 今晚是女士之夜

translation.en: ♪ Oh, what a night… ♪
translation.zh: 今夜多美好…

translation.en: What a night!
translation.zh: 今夜多美好！

translation.en: Fuck it, let's dance!
translation.zh: 去他的 跳起来吧！

translation.en: ♪ And the feeling's right ♪
translation.zh: 这感觉恰好对味

translation.en: ♪ Oh, yes, it's ladies' night Oh, what a night ♪
translation.zh: 没错 今晚是女士之夜今夜真美好

translation.en: ♪ Romantic cliff beasts ♪
translation.zh: 浪漫的悬崖野兽

translation.en: ♪ You have a T. rex ♪
translation.zh: 这里有霸王龙

translation.en: ♪ Sophisticated raptor… ♪
translation.zh: 迅猛龙

translation.en: [groans] Son of a bitch!
translation.zh: 狗娘养的！

translation.en: Walk away!
translation.zh: 滚开！

translation.en: ♪ Come play with me tonight, mama ♪
translation.zh: 今晚和我一起欢度吧 美女

translation.en: ♪ This is your night tonight… ♪
translation.zh: 今晚只属于你…

translation.en: Fuck this place! Whoo!
translation.zh: 这地方真烂… 今晚只属于你

translation.en: ♪ This is your night tonight ♪
translation.zh: 今晚只属于你

translation.en: ♪ Everything's gonna be all right ♪
translation.zh: 一切都会好起来

translation.en: ♪ This is your night tonight ♪
translation.zh: 今晚只属于你

translation.en: ♪ Everything's gonna be all right ♪
translation.zh: 一切都会好起来

translation.en: ♪ This is your night tonight ♪
translation.zh: 今晚只属于你

translation.en: ♪ Everything's gonna be ♪
translation.zh: 一切都会…

translation.en: I'm on set joined by the amazing cast of Cliff Beasts 6.
translation.zh: 我在《悬崖野兽6》片场采访优秀的演员团队

translation.en: Carol, what's it been like
translation.zh: 卡罗尔 回到片场

translation.en: being back on set with all of your Cliff Beasts buddies?
translation.zh: 和《悬崖野兽》的伙伴们团聚你是什么感受？

translation.en: It's great! I find myself smiling the whole time.
translation.zh: 感觉很棒！我感觉自己一直在笑

translation.en: My face hurts from all the smiling.
translation.zh: 我的脸都笑僵了

translation.en: Now, we must take a moment to discuss the difficult times we're all in.
translation.zh: 我们需要花些时间讨论一下大家都经历的这段艰难时光

translation.en: [interviewer] Do any of you have a thought about what we can do
translation.zh: 你们当中有没有谁想过我们该怎么做

translation.en: to solve the problems that plague our world right now?
translation.zh: 解决此时正肆虐全球的疫情吗？

translation.en: I have some good news for the world, and I think it might help a little bit.
translation.zh: 我有个好消息要向全世界宣布或许能帮上一点忙

translation.en: Uh, the studio just decided that since we're doing such a great job,
translation.zh: 电影公司刚刚决定既然拍摄如此顺利

translation.en: we're gonna roll right into shooting Cliff Beasts 7.
translation.zh: 我们会直接进行《悬崖野兽7》的拍摄

translation.en: -[Sean] Amazing! -What?
translation.zh: -太棒了！-什么？

translation.en: As soon as we complete 6!
translation.zh: 一完成第六部就拍！

translation.en: What do you mean? I didn't sign up for Cliff Beasts 7!
translation.zh: 什么意思？我没签《悬崖野兽7》的合同！

translation.en: -Oh, it's the same shoot. -No. I'm not doing that.
translation.zh: -是同一个拍摄任务-不行 我不拍

translation.en: I am out. Not doing it! No.
translation.zh: 我退出 我不拍！不行

translation.en: Is this live?
translation.zh: 这是直播吗？

translation.en: Hello, can you hear me? Please help us, okay?
translation.zh: 大家好 能听到我说话吗？帮帮我们 好吗？

translation.en: They are holding us against our will. I can't do another movie.
translation.zh: 他们违背我们的意愿囚禁我们我不可能再拍一部电影

translation.en: -I can't! It's not safe here, okay? -[switch clicks]
translation.zh: 我做不到！这里不安全 好吗？

translation.en: What the fuck happened to the lights? Can somebody turn those back on?
translation.zh: 我做不到！这里不安全 好吗？ 灯怎么灭了？谁能开一下灯吗？

translation.en: -What? -It's not live.
translation.zh: -怎么了？-这不是直播

translation.en: -[Carol] What? -It's not live.
translation.zh: -什么？-这不是直播

translation.en: -We're not live. -[Carol] Oh.
translation.zh: 我们没在直播

translation.en: [Carol] Hey, Krystal's Kittens. You may not know me,
translation.zh: 嘿 克丽丝托的可可粉们 你们或许不认识我但我是克丽丝托的一个密友

translation.en: but I am a really close friend of Krystal's.
translation.zh: 你们或许不认识我但我是克丽丝托的一个密友

translation.en: I know we are all struggling during this time,
translation.zh: 我知道大家日子都不好过

translation.en: but the Cliff Beasts cast is being held against its will, partially,
translation.zh: 但《悬崖野兽》的演员算是在非自愿的情况下被扣押

translation.en: and forced to complete a film under very inhumane conditions.
translation.zh: 被迫在非常不人道的条件下完成一部电影

translation.en: Lauren Van Chance got her hand shot off,
translation.zh: 劳伦范钱斯的手被崩掉了

translation.en: and they are making us work through influenza!
translation.zh: 他们让我们在患流感的情况下工作！

translation.en: So we need you to jump on Instagram, TikTok, Twitter, even LinkedIn,
translation.zh: 我们需要你们在照片墙、抖音、推特甚至领英上声援我们

translation.en: and demand that they allow us to go home.
translation.zh: 要求他们允许我们回家

translation.en: With full pay. And no repercussions.
translation.zh: 拿到全薪 而且不会被秋后算账

translation.en: Oh! That is perfect. Thank you so much, Krystal.
translation.zh: 太完美了 十分感谢 克丽丝托

translation.en: I'm so happy to help. I know how hard it's been for some of the older actors.
translation.zh: 我很乐意帮忙我理解一些年长演员的处境

translation.en: Yeah, it's been hard for them.
translation.zh: 对 对他们来说很艰难

translation.en: -You shouldn't post it. -What? Why?
translation.zh: -你不应该发布这条帖子-什么？为什么？

translation.en: Because you sound like whiny, spoiled actors.
translation.zh: 因为你听起来像个抱怨连天恃宠而骄的演员

translation.en: I am not spoiled!
translation.zh: 我才没有恃宠而骄！

translation.en: People don't wanna hear celebrities complain
translation.zh: 大家都反感听到名人抱怨

translation.en: about how hard their movie sets are.
translation.zh: 他们在电影片场有多难

translation.en: They have real problems.
translation.zh: 他们面对的才是现实问题

translation.en: What are you talking about? These are real problems.
translation.zh: 你在说什么？这些就是现实问题啊

translation.en: They're never gonna let us go home!
translation.zh: 他们永远都不让我们回家了！

translation.en: Hold on. If this is gonna make me look bad, I am not posting this.
translation.zh: 等等 如果这会让我出丑那我不能发

translation.en: I can't ruin my own brand.
translation.zh: 我不能毁掉自己的人设

translation.en: It's not gonna hurt. You're the hero.
translation.zh: 不会有任何坏处 你最好了

translation.en: -It would make you look really bad. -[Carol] Whoa, uh…
translation.zh: 这真的会让你出丑

translation.en: What did you just do?
translation.zh: 你刚刚做了什么？

translation.en: I deleted it.
translation.zh: 我删掉了

translation.en: What? Why would you…
translation.zh: 什么？你为什么要…

translation.en: [grunts] She is one of them! Not us!
translation.zh: 她和他们是一伙的！和我们不是自己人！

translation.en: She is not! She's my friend.
translation.zh: 不是的！她是我朋友

translation.en: You sound like some crazy, rambling old actress. We're leaving.
translation.zh: 你听起来像个上了年纪疯疯癫癫的女演员 我们走

translation.en: I am the second youngest one!
translation.zh: 我是第二年轻的！

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: I deserved that.
translation.zh: 我活该

translation.en: You'll survive.
translation.zh: 你会撑下去的

translation.en: Fuck you.
translation.zh: 去死吧

translation.en: I'm sorry I hit you. I'm just having a really hard time right now.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我打了你我现在真的很不好过

translation.en: -Hey, Sean. -You said you wanted to talk to me.
translation.zh: -嘿 肖恩-你说想找我聊聊

translation.en: -Thank you for coming. Come in. -Sure.
translation.zh: -谢谢你能来 进来吧-好的

translation.en: I'm just having a bit of a hard time,
translation.zh: 我现在有点不好过

translation.en: and I didn't know what to do or where to go.
translation.zh: 不知道该何去何从

translation.en: -Um, Sean? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -肖恩？-我在

translation.en: I always thought you guys were all fucking clowns.
translation.zh: 我一直觉得你们这些人都是小丑

translation.en: I thought I was the only one who had it all together.
translation.zh: 我以为自己是唯一头脑清醒的人

translation.en: But Josh was right.
translation.zh: 但乔希说得对

translation.en: I'm the worst one of all of you.
translation.zh: 我是你们这些人中最差劲的

translation.en: -No! -Yes!
translation.zh: -不！-是的！

translation.en: But you?
translation.zh: 但你？

translation.en: You're always so happy and positive all the time,
translation.zh: 你自始至终都非常乐观 积极向上

translation.en: and I was just hoping that maybe you could help me because I'm falling apart here.
translation.zh: 我希望你能帮帮我 因为我快崩溃了

translation.en: Carol.
translation.zh: 卡罗尔

translation.en: Problems?
translation.zh: 困难？

translation.en: They're just lessons in disguise.
translation.zh: 它们只是教训 塞翁失马 焉知非福

translation.en: Remember that one step is the first… There's… You know…
translation.zh: 记住迈出去才是第一…你知道…

translation.en: The first step in the thousand steps of your journey.
translation.zh: 千里之行 始于足下

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Every day…
translation.zh: 每天…

translation.en: every day is an opportunity for, uh…
translation.zh: 每天都是一个机会…

translation.en: Uh, for you to…
translation.zh: 让你可以…

translation.en: For what?
translation.zh: 可以什么…

translation.en: I don't have a fucking clue.
translation.zh: 我屁都不知道

translation.en: I don't know what I'm doing.
translation.zh: 我不知道自己在做什么

translation.en: I'm a complete fraud.
translation.zh: 我是个彻头彻尾的骗子

translation.en: -What? -I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -什么？-我很抱歉

translation.en: The book is great. You should read the book.
translation.zh: 这本书很好 你应该读读这本书

translation.en: But please understand, I didn't write it. Steve Harvey's ghostwriter wrote the book.
translation.zh: 但请你理解 那本书不是我写的是史蒂夫哈维的代笔写的

translation.en: In fact, the only time… [laughing]
translation.zh: 其实 我唯一一次…

translation.en: The only time I ever read it
translation.zh: 我也只是在录影棚

translation.en: was when I was in the recording studio, making the audio book.
translation.zh: 录电子有声书时读过那么一次！

translation.en: And I was bored. I was bored with the whole experience.
translation.zh: 我感到很无聊录音整个过程都很无聊

translation.en: Okay? I'm sorry, but during the pandemic, I realized that we're all the same.
translation.zh: 好吗？我很抱歉 但在疫情期间我意识到大家都是一样的

translation.en: And I thought that I was special.
translation.zh: 我以前觉得自己很特别

translation.en: And, uh, you know, that's all I got.
translation.zh: 我就这点本事

translation.en: But I'm not.
translation.zh: 但我不特别

translation.en: I'm not.
translation.zh: 一点都不

translation.en: Oh, my God!
