translation.en: Hey, how you doing?
translation.zh: 嘿 你好

translation.en: You know what, Dustin?
translation.zh: 知道吗 达斯汀？

translation.en: [amplified] I'm in charge of this movie.
translation.zh: 这部电影我说了算

translation.en: You're gonna do what I tell you to do. Sorry, everybody.
translation.zh: 你要按照我说的做 抱歉 各位

translation.en: I am the painter, and you are the paint!
translation.zh: 我是画家 你是颜料！

translation.en: I think this is gonna really work. I think this is really fun.
translation.zh: 我觉得这样可以 我觉得非常有意思

translation.en: Who the fuck is that?
translation.zh: 这家伙是谁?

translation.en: Don't insult my mocap men!
translation.zh: 不要侮辱我的动作捕捉演员！

translation.en: You know what, guys? As soon as we wrap, I'm gonna punch you both in the jaw.
translation.zh: 知道吗 各位？我们一拍完我就给你们俩下巴都来一拳

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna write you a stern bloody email.
translation.zh: 我要给你写封严厉警告的邮件

translation.en: Guys! The sooner we get everybody… Where's the cast?
translation.zh: 各位！我们越早让大家…演员呢？

translation.en: Where's the fucking cast?
translation.zh: 演员们都去哪了？

translation.en: Gavin! Where is everybody?
translation.zh: 加文！大家都去哪了？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: [amplified] First team, we need you on set. We are not done shooting.
translation.zh: 第一组 请回到片场我们还没完成拍摄

translation.en: First fucking team!
translation.zh: 去他妈的第一组！

translation.en: Come on, guys! We're losing time!
translation.zh: 快回来 各位！我们没时间了！

translation.en: Where's Dustin?
translation.zh: 达斯汀呢？

translation.en: God damn it!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: Dustin, you're wanted back on set. Soon as you can make it, that'd be great.
translation.zh: 达斯汀 请回到片场 越快回来越好

translation.en: Fucking prick!
translation.zh: 一群混蛋！

translation.en: Mr. Best, there's been a breach.
translation.zh: 贝斯特先生 有人逃跑

translation.en: I believe the children wanna play!
translation.zh: 看来这些孩子想玩游戏！

translation.en: Okay, let's have some fun.
translation.zh: 好 那我们就好好玩

translation.en: [hesitates] Can I leave?
translation.zh: 我可以离开吗？

translation.en: No! I'm sorry I'm not Patty Jenkins.
translation.zh: 不行！真可惜我不是派蒂杰金斯

translation.en: I don't get to work with fucking Cal Gadot.
translation.zh: 我没办法和盖尔加朵一起工作

translation.en: Gotta work with these fucks!
translation.zh: 而是要跟这些废物共事！

translation.en: There's some really crazy shit going down on the Cliff Beasts set right now.
translation.zh: 现在《悬崖野兽》片场乱套了

translation.en: I don't even know where to begin.
translation.zh: 我不知道要从何说起

translation.en: It's been really hard on set these days--
translation.zh: 这些天在片场都很艰难…

translation.en: Hey! What's happening? Has something gone wrong?
translation.zh: 嘿！怎么了？出什么事了吗？

translation.en: Get out of my way.
translation.zh: 让开

translation.en: -Is there something we can do-- -To cheer them up?
translation.zh: -如果有什么我们能做的…-给他们打打气

translation.en: Cheer them up? This'll cheer them up! -This'll cheer them up! -Whoa! -This'll cheer them up! -Aah!
translation.zh: 给他们打打气？这样能给他们打气！

translation.en: What are you doing? Crikey!
translation.zh: 你在做什么？哎呀！

translation.en: -Do you want cheering up? -No, I'm-- Do you want cheering up?
translation.zh: -你想打气吗？-不想 我…

translation.en: I'm on a different film.
translation.zh: 我在拍另一部电影

translation.en: -That slowed them down a bit. -Three, four seconds. Yeah.
translation.zh: -这也算是拖了他们一会儿-三 四秒吧

translation.en: What the hell was that?
translation.zh: 刚才到底怎么回事？

translation.en: I'm stopping you. You have a movie to finish.
translation.zh: 我在阻止你 我还有电影要拍

translation.en: I thought you were my friend.
translation.zh: 我还以为你是我朋友

translation.en: I was paid to be your friend!
translation.zh: 我是被雇来做你朋友的！

translation.en: They paid you?
translation.zh: 他们给你钱？

translation.en: -I'm a mole! -What are you talking about?
translation.zh: -我是间谍！-你在说什么？

translation.en: And by the way, you are a mediocre dancer.
translation.zh: 对了 你的舞技真的很一般

translation.en: That's my appeal, bitch!
translation.zh: 这就是我的魅力所在 贱人！

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 不是吧

translation.en: Hey. Hey, stop. Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿 站住 嘿！

translation.en: Hey, why are you running?
translation.zh: 嘿 你跑什么？

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: -Hey, stop! -Why are you chasing me?
translation.zh: -嘿 站住！-你追我干什么？

translation.en: -Why are you running? -Get the hell away from me!
translation.zh: -你跑什么？-离我远点！

translation.en: [Carol] God, get off of me!
translation.zh: 你给我起开！

translation.en: -Why were you running? -Why do you care if I'm running?
translation.zh: -你刚才跑什么？-你为什么在乎我跑什么？

translation.en: You could have stolen something.
translation.zh: 你可能偷东西了

translation.en: I didn't steal anything.
translation.zh: 我什么都没偷

translation.en: I really don't think you're allowed to run during a pandemic.
translation.zh: 我觉得疫情期间不应该跑

translation.en: I have to because it is an emergency.
translation.zh: 我必须要跑 因为有紧急情况

translation.en: Great. I have a sore leg, and what do I have to do for the rest of my day? Run.
translation.zh: 好吧 我腿很疼我这一天接下来还要干什么呢？跑

translation.en: Aw! Somebody get Professor X his wheelchair!
translation.zh: 给X教授推轮椅过来！

translation.en: I play a lot of different characters. Not just him!
translation.zh: 我演过很多其他角色 不仅仅是他！

translation.en: -You're… -Carol Cobb.
translation.zh: -你是…-卡罗尔柯布

translation.en: -Carol Cobb. -We went on a date, remember?
translation.zh: -卡罗尔柯布-我们约过会 还记得吗？

translation.en: Oh, wow.
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: You don't remember--
translation.zh: -你不记得…-噢

translation.en: Oh. Hey, hi.
translation.zh: 嘿 嗨

translation.en: -They need me back on set. -Nobody's calling you. That's not a phone.
translation.zh: -他们需要我回片场-没人给你打电话 那不是手机

translation.en: [sighs] There's my phone.
translation.zh: 手机在那里啊

translation.en: Got you now, you dirty hippie.
translation.zh: 这下你跑不掉了 下流的嬉皮士

translation.en: [amplified] Hey, get your ass off the set! What are you, crazy?
translation.zh: 嘿 从我的片场滚出去！你是疯了吗？

translation.en: Mr. Best!
translation.zh: 贝斯特先生！

translation.en: What? What is it, Gavin?
translation.zh: 什么？怎么了 加文？

translation.en: What now?
translation.zh: 现在又怎么了？

translation.en: Cliff Beasts!
translation.zh: 《悬崖野兽》！

translation.en: Shit, it's in his hand!
translation.zh: 天啊 射到他的手了！

translation.en: Can I be in Cliff Beasts 7 now I shot him for you?
translation.zh: 我都为你射他了可以让我参演《悬崖野兽7》吗？

translation.en: I'll make a call.
translation.zh: 我会给你打电话的

translation.en: Thank you. Sorry about flipping out earlier.
translation.zh: 谢谢 抱歉我之前抓狂了

translation.en: -There's a lot of stress and emotions. -Just let me enjoy this moment.
translation.zh: -我感觉压力很大 情绪很复杂-让我好好享受此刻

translation.en: -Do you know how to fly that thing? -Yeah, I took eight lessons.
translation.zh: -你知道怎么开这玩意吗？-知道 我上过八节课

translation.en: [Darren] Hey! Where do you think you're going? Huh?
translation.zh: 嘿！你们要去哪？

translation.en: Don't move!
translation.zh: 别动！

translation.en: Stay there!
translation.zh: 待在原地！

translation.en: How do the brakes work on this thing? God damn it.
translation.zh: 这玩意怎么刹车？该死

translation.en: No one's getting in that helicopter!
translation.zh: 谁都不准上直升机！

translation.en: Turn around.
translation.zh: 转身

translation.en: Turn around, go back to set.
translation.zh: 转过身去 马上回片场

translation.en: I won Sundance with a movie I made on my phone!
translation.zh: 我用手机拍摄的一部电影得过圣丹斯奖！

translation.en: An iPhone 6!
translation.zh: 用苹果6拍的！

translation.en: I am not going back to my old life.
translation.zh: 我才不要回到以前的生活

translation.en: You think I want to go back to Home Depot, selling tiles?
translation.zh: 你们觉得我想回去家得宝卖瓷砖吗？

translation.en: This is my shot!
translation.zh: 这是我的机会！

translation.en: Your call time is right now!
translation.zh: 你们必须马上拍摄！

translation.en: I got this.
translation.zh: 我来解决

translation.en: -You got what? This? -You wanna go, Cimino?
translation.zh: -你解决什么？现在这情况吗？-要过过招吗 奇米诺？

translation.en: -Do I wanna go? Yeah. -Come on.
translation.zh: -我想过过招吗？当然了-来吧

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: You wanna play around? Is that what you want?
translation.zh: 你想玩玩吗？你想跟我玩玩？

translation.en: [Carol] Yeah.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: What are they doing?
translation.zh: 他们在做什么？

translation.en: I'm pretty sure it's the tribesmen fight from the movie.
translation.zh: 我很确定这是电影里的部落大战

translation.en: -Oh. This is a terrible fight. -[Dustin] Go again?
translation.zh: 打得太糟糕了

translation.en: -All right. -From the top?
translation.zh: -好的-要重新开始吗？

translation.en: Grab. Block away, one punch, second punch. Down, stomach. Duck.
translation.zh: 抓住 挡住 一拳 两拳往下 打肚子 躲开

translation.en: The fight I was just in was way better than this.
translation.zh: 我刚才打的那架都比这激烈得多

translation.en: Attaboy.
translation.zh: 真棒

translation.en: -Give me that! -Yeah!
translation.zh: -给我！-耶！

translation.en: Should we stop it?
translation.zh: 我们要拉架吗？

translation.en: Probably not. No one's getting hurt.
translation.zh: 还是不要吧 没人受伤

translation.en: Shit! Dustin, just do something different! Anything!
translation.zh: 该死！达斯汀 用点不一样的招式！什么都可以！

translation.en: All right. Here's a page one rewrite.
translation.zh: 好的 这是重写的第一页

translation.en: On your balls!
translation.zh: 攻击蛋蛋！

translation.en: -[Darren groans] -There it is!
translation.zh: 好样的！

translation.en: -Yeah! That's different. -Hit to the face!
translation.zh: -好棒！这招不一样-攻击脸部！

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: -Attaboy, Dustin! -Let's go.
translation.zh: -好样的 达斯汀！-我们走

translation.en: -[groans] -[Sean] Dieter! Dieter, come on!
translation.zh: -迪特尔！-迪特尔 走了！

translation.en: You should have gone with my pages.
translation.zh: 你应该照我重写的剧本拍的

translation.en: All right, now this…
translation.zh: 好了 重大时刻

translation.en: That's done. Okay, all right, this goes…
translation.zh: 这个好了 好的 这个要…

translation.en: [Carol] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: My cast! [groans]
translation.zh: 我的演员团队！

translation.en: [Dieter] Anika,
translation.zh: 安妮卡

translation.en: you made it okay!
translation.zh: 你来了！

translation.en: I got in here three hours early just to be safe.
translation.zh: 安全起见 我提前三个小时就到了

translation.en: I wanna live with you. I wanna live with you in Beverly Hills.
translation.zh: 我想跟你一起生活我想跟你住在比弗利山庄

translation.en: -I live in Sherman Oaks. -Even better!
translation.zh: -我住在谢尔曼奥克斯-那样更好！

translation.en: -You got this? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你可以吗？-可以

translation.en: -Whoo! -No celebrating yet.
translation.zh: 先别庆祝

translation.en: -Okay, no, we-- -[Dustin] Fly it.
translation.zh: -好的 不 我们…-快起飞

translation.en: Oh, man, this is a rush!
translation.zh: 天啊 好快！

translation.en: All right!
translation.zh: 好的！

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 好棒！

translation.en: Why are we standing still?
translation.zh: 我们怎么在原地打转？

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: -[hesitates] Just hold on-- -[Dustin] Let's get going.
translation.zh: -抓住…-我们快走

translation.en: Okay, just give me a second. Um…
translation.zh: 好 等我一下

translation.en: Okay, what is that one?
translation.zh: 好吧 这个是什么？

translation.en: I've not seen that button. I do not know what that does.
translation.zh: 我没见过这按钮我不知道它有什么作用

translation.en: [Darren] What happens now?
translation.zh: 现在怎么办？

translation.en: You're definitely gonna get the sack for getting Howie to shoot Mr. Best.
translation.zh: 你肯定会因为让豪伊射到贝斯特先生而被开除

translation.en: You'll be in directors jail for the rest of your life, if that. You're finished.
translation.zh: 你这辈子最多会待在导演黑名单上下不来 你完蛋了

translation.en: And I'm just gonna take over as producer and get the movie in the can.
translation.zh: 然后我会以制片人的身份接手把电影拍完

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: Uh, I only know how to go up and down.
translation.zh: 我只知道怎么上下飞

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: For the movie, they only taught me how to go up and down.
translation.zh: 出于拍摄需要 他们只教了我上下飞

translation.en: They didn't teach me how to go forward.
translation.zh: 他们没教我怎么前进

translation.en: I don't know how to move forward, okay? I'm just, uh… I don't know what else to do.
translation.zh: 我不知道怎么前进 好吗？我…我不知道还能怎么做

translation.en: Just push it forward!
translation.zh: 往前推！

translation.en: Well, I don't know if that's how it works. It might be how it works. I don't know!
translation.zh: 我不知道会不会有用可能是这个原理 我不知道！

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -What is happening?
translation.zh: -天啊-怎么了？

translation.en: Krystal, go on YouTube. See if there's a helicopter tutorial or something!
translation.zh: 克丽丝托 上YouTube看有没有直升机教程！

translation.en: Does YouTube still exist?
translation.zh: YouTube还存在吗？

translation.en: -Yes! -Yes, YouTube exists!
translation.zh: -存在！-对 YouTube还存在！

translation.en: -It still exists! -Okay!
translation.zh: -还存在！-好的！

translation.en: -Um… -Hurry, Krystal.
translation.zh: 快点 克丽丝托

translation.en: What? What are you looking at?
translation.zh: 什么？你在看什么？

translation.en: [Krystal] It's a monkey being washed in a sink.
translation.zh: -是一只猴子在水槽里洗澡-它在洗澡

translation.en: -[Dustin] It's taking a bath. -[Sean] What's happening?
translation.zh: -是一只猴子在水槽里洗澡-它在洗澡 怎么了？

translation.en: -It's a monkey. -A monkey taking a bath?
translation.zh: -一只猴子-猴子在洗澡吗？

translation.en: -Look, he's so cute! -Let me see.
translation.zh: 看 它好可爱！

translation.en: I don't think he likes it!
translation.zh: 我觉得它不太喜欢洗澡！

translation.en: -Aw! His fur is so soapy! -[alarm beeping]
translation.zh: 它的毛上沾满了香皂！

translation.en: -Stop this! -Stop!
translation.zh: 快打住！

translation.en: [Sean] Krystal, show me!
translation.zh: 克丽丝托 给我看！

translation.en: Hurry! Let's go!
translation.zh: 快点！快走！

translation.en: Stop yelling at me! Go, just watch it!
translation.zh: 别吼我了！快点看！

translation.en: Today, I'd like to talk to you about how to fly a helicopter.
translation.zh: 今天 我想跟大家聊聊怎样驾驶直升机

translation.en: Why don't we hop in and I'll show you how it works?
translation.zh: 我们一起上直升机我给大家展示一下如何操作吧

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Oh.
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: It's a prop. It doesn't work.
translation.zh: 这是道具 杀不了人

translation.en: I just thought maybe this could scare them into coming back.
translation.zh: 我就是想着这样或许能把他们吓回来

translation.en: -Okay, I think I got it. -Darren is pointing a gun at us right now!
translation.zh: -好吧 我应该学会了-达伦在用枪指着我们！

translation.en: -[Carol] Oh, my God! We gotta go. Go! -[Sean] Okay. Uh-huh.
translation.zh: -我觉得…-我们要赶紧走 -快走-好的

translation.en: Sean, I believe in you.
translation.zh: 肖恩 我对你有信心

translation.en: You can do this.
translation.zh: 你可以的

translation.en: I wanna be the hero, but I can't do it.
translation.zh: 我想做英雄 但我做不到

translation.en: Come on, guys, we're a family!
translation.zh: 来吧 各位 我们是一家人！

translation.en: Let's do this together.
translation.zh: 我们一起推

translation.en: [Dustin] Come on.
translation.zh: 快

translation.en: All right. Okay, guys, here we go.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 来吧

translation.en: We're doing it. We're doing it. We're moving forward.
translation.zh: 我们做到了 我们在往前飞了

translation.en: No, we're good! We're good! We're good! We're good!
translation.zh: 没事 我们没事了！

translation.en: We're good. I've got it. Okay.
translation.zh: 我们没事 我可以的 好了

translation.en: So how are you doing? This seems like a major setback.
translation.zh: 你们感觉如何？这好像是个重大挫折

translation.en: We're gonna be fine! We'll put a cut together. It's gonna be great.
translation.zh: 我们会好起来的！我们会剪个片子出来 效果一定很好

translation.en: We're not done. They'll probably come back!
translation.zh: 我们还没完呢 他们可能会回来！

translation.en: I think I got it, everyone.
translation.zh: 我好像会开了 各位

translation.en: We're going home.
translation.zh: 我们要回家了

translation.en: [Bola] You sons of bitches, you didn't tip us!
translation.zh: 你们这些狗杂种 不接上我们！

translation.en: -[Carol] Oh, my God! -Bye-bye, Clifton!
translation.zh: -天啊！-再见 克利夫顿！

translation.en: -Bye! -Whoo-hoo!
translation.zh: 再见！

translation.en: I'm Susan Howard, reporting live
translation.zh: 我是苏珊霍华德 此刻正在直播

translation.en: from the premiere of a documentary about a disastrous production
translation.zh: 一部讲述命运多舛的电影拍摄的纪录片首映礼

translation.en: that the entire nation is talking about.
translation.zh: 全国上下都对此津津乐道

translation.en: I'm a beast!
translation.zh: 我是野兽！

translation.en: [both] We're a beast!
translation.zh: 我们是野兽！

translation.en: [all] I'm a beast!
translation.zh: 我是野兽！

translation.en: -[both] I'm a beast! -I ain't a fucking cliff beast.
translation.zh: -我是野兽！-我才不是悬崖野兽

translation.en: -Let's get ready to bubble! -Bubble!
translation.zh: -一起来泡泡剧组吧！-泡泡！

translation.en: [Dustin] Cliff Beasts 6?
translation.zh: 《悬崖野兽6》？

translation.en: Holy shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: When Howie cracked, that's when we all should have just gotten out of there.
translation.zh: 豪伊崩溃的时候 我们就该离开的

translation.en: And here's a warning. Do not leak this on the Internet, you fucking idiots.
translation.zh: 我警告你们 不要泄露到网上你们这些蠢蛋

translation.en: -[Krystal] The security was insane. -[yelling]
translation.zh: 安保措施严到令人发指

translation.en: They had guns.
translation.zh: 他们有枪

translation.en: It felt like America, but in England.
translation.zh: 感觉像是美国 但其实是在英国

translation.en: The second these things go to streamers, they're gonna be watched on televisions,
translation.zh: 这些东西一旦进入流媒体就会出现在电视上

translation.en: and then that makes me a television star.
translation.zh: 然后我就会成为电视明星

translation.en: I'm not a television star! I am a movie star!
translation.zh: 我不是电视明星！我是电影明星！

translation.en: What do you think I am? Young Sheldon?
translation.zh: 你们觉得我是谁？小谢尔顿吗？

translation.en: -No, don't leave me! -Let go!
translation.zh: -不 别离开我！-放手！

translation.en: Not now. Turn that off, you tit!
translation.zh: 现在别拍了 关掉 你这傻瓜！

translation.en: Yeah, the cast all called me EPK Guy.
translation.zh: 对 演员们都叫我负责电子版发行包的人

translation.en: It's like, "That's not my name. My name is Scott."
translation.zh: “我不叫这个名字 我叫斯科特”

translation.en: Now they know it. It's on the fucking poster.
translation.zh: 现在他们知道了我的名字就在海报上

translation.en: How does it feel to be the villain of Beasts of the Bubble?
translation.zh: 当《泡泡野兽》中的反派是什么感觉？

translation.en: [chuckling] I'm not the villain. What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 我不是反派 你在说什么？

translation.en: Why are you complaining? I can't leave and have almost no lines.
translation.zh: 你为什么要抱怨？我都不能走而且一句台词都没有

translation.en: I'm over here with my dick in my hands like a piece-of-shit extra!
translation.zh: 我在这里 手里握着我的老二就像一坨多余的屎！

translation.en: No, I didn't know that all my Zoom calls were being recorded.
translation.zh: 不 我不知道自己所有的视频通话都被录下来了

translation.en: I could sue, but I won't 'cause I'm in on the joke,
translation.zh: 我可以起诉 但我不会的因为我是知情人

translation.en: and I love the joke.
translation.zh: 这主意太棒了

translation.en: So you're the mole!
translation.zh: 你是间谍！

translation.en: [chuckling] I know! I'm the mole.
translation.zh: 我知道！我就是间谍

translation.en: I never thought it could work as just a hand.
translation.zh: 真没想到它能像真手一样

translation.en: High five.
translation.zh: 击掌

translation.en: See?
translation.zh: 看到没？

translation.en: Sean, how are you doing?
translation.zh: 肖恩 你近来如何？

translation.en: I heard you just got out of rehab for cocaine addiction.
translation.zh: 我听说你刚刚结束可卡因戒毒

translation.en: Yes, two-day rehab. I walked in one day. I said, "I think I'm addicted to cocaine."
translation.zh: 是的 两天的戒毒 我有一天过去那里我说：“我好像染上了可卡因毒瘾”

translation.en: They said, "You shouldn't do that anymore." I said, "Done."
translation.zh: 他们说：“你不能再嗑药了”我说：“没问题”

translation.en: -Two days, huh? -48 hours.
translation.zh: -两天吗？-48小时

translation.en: What's your next project, Darren?
translation.zh: 你下个项目是什么 达伦？

translation.en: I'm doing the Skittles movie.
translation.zh: 我要拍彩虹糖电影

translation.en: It's based on the candy. It's got a great story. A passion project.
translation.zh: 以糖果为题材 很出彩的故事我是出于热爱才拍的

translation.en: And it's about racism and diversity, and how we can all get along.
translation.zh: 这片子涉及到种族主义和多样性以及人类如何共处

translation.en: It's all the flavors, but it all goes under one name. Skittles.
translation.zh: 电影包含所有口味但都可以用一个名字概括 彩虹糖

translation.en: So much exciting news for the two of you. And who's this?
translation.zh: 你们两个真是好消息不断 这是谁？

translation.en: This is our friend, Kate.
translation.zh: 这是我们的朋友凯特

translation.en: I have no idea why I'm here.
translation.zh: 我不知道自己为何要来

translation.en: Come on, Kate.
translation.zh: 别这样 凯特

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: I'm a beast!
translation.zh: 我是野兽！

translation.en: -Come on, Rafi, just say it with me. -No, get off me!
translation.zh: -来啊 拉斐 跟我一起说-不要 放开我！

translation.en: So how have you been doing since the movie?
translation.zh: 拍完电影后 你近况如何？

translation.en: Um, yeah, good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Um, so I'm worried I'm gonna get in trouble
translation.zh: 我很担心自己会惹上麻烦

translation.en: because I didn't send the swabs off to get tested.
translation.zh: 因为我没有把棉签送去做检测

translation.en: Um, so I've still got most of them at home.
translation.zh: 大多数棉签都还在我家

translation.en: And even now I don't really know where to send them. If you know?
translation.zh: 我到现在都还不知道该送去哪你知道吗？

translation.en: No? Thank you.
translation.zh: 不知道吗？谢谢

translation.en: Do you think they have enough footage in the can to put a cut together?
translation.zh: 你觉得他们有足够的录像剪成一部片子吗？

translation.en: We didn't get any of the opening,
translation.zh: 我们没多少开始时的录像

translation.en: but maybe that doesn't matter as long as the ending's strong.
translation.zh: 但只要结局足够猛烈或许就没什么关系

translation.en: Yeah. The rest of the movie can be shit as long as the ending's good
translation.zh: 对 只要结局够好其他部分都是垃圾也无所谓

translation.en: 'cause that's what they'll remember. You know?
translation.zh: 因为观众只会记住结局

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Well, at least we tried to make a movie.
translation.zh: 至少我们为拍出这部电影努力过

translation.en: They can't judge us for that.
translation.zh: 这点他们没法批评我们

translation.en: We made something that's a distraction in these difficult times.
translation.zh: 我们创作了一部作品在艰难时期帮大家分分心

translation.en: It's really hard to direct in these things.
translation.zh: 这种情况下 导演电影真的很难
